description: Mother-of-pearl paths converge here in a large circle.  The stones glow softly, evidence of the magic needed to work such into uniform cobbles.  Simple benches of black marble line the circle.  In its center, a polished obelisk of silver-veined black marble reaches toward the sky.  The air is thick with sweet floral scents.

title: Liabo Circle, Cholen Garden
description: A troupe of marble troubadours performs here, their melody frozen in stone.  Small wooden benches face the statues.  Some sorcery is at work here, for you can hear the fading echoes of the performers' song.

title: Liabo Circle, Eonak Garden
description: Large blocks of black-veined red granite form a semicircle here.  Each has been carved with images from ancient history -- drakes aloft battling ur-daemons, Arkati walking the land as teachers, the peoples of the land beginning their civilizations.  In the center of the stones is a small steel and brass fountain.

title: Liabo Circle, Jastev Garden
description: Statues of black-veined grey marble line the softly glowing path.  Each of them depicts a lean, sullen individual deep in meditation.  Some glamour is at work here, for their stoney eyelids lift on occasion, staring for a moment in your direction.

title: Liabo Circle, Wooded Path
description: The path wanders through a leafy glade, meandering about like a preoccupied child.  A few small buildings crouch among the trees.  From one, you hear faint strains of a lyre.

title: Liabo Circle, Kuon Garden
description: A riot of vegetation has overgrown the area.  Creeper vines cover the tall trellis arching over the path.  Roses, orchids, tulips and a dozen other types of flowers grow to either side, a cacophony of floral life.  The path itself appears to be mother-of-pearl.

title: Silvergate, 2nd Floor Hallway
description: Plush, dark green carpeting underfoot complements the stained oak wainscot of this light and airy landing.  Along one wall you see a heavy oak sideboard.  Two crystal vases with arrangements of fresh cut flowers adorn each end of the sideboard and their reflections in a mirror above fill the room with their color.  The delicate scent of the flowers intermingles pleasantly with the smell of freshly polished woodwork.

title: Hearthstone, Reading Room
description: More a large alcove than a room, this nook is lined on two walls with shelves reaching from the floor to the ceiling.  On the north wall, a large window and window seat, complete with soft cushions and pillows, invite you to sit and browse the collection of old favorites lining the shelves.  One shelf holds a collection of the Elanthia Herald, some brittle with age, but all obviously read often.  A lap robe sits folded on the seat, ready to warm those who sit here on a cold winter day.

title: Hearthstone, Master Suite
description: Living in this room would be easy, with sofas and chairs arranged into intimate groups.  The hard wood flooring, worn over the years by the footsteps of those long gone, still retains its beauty with deep green area rugs softening the hard flooring and dampening footsteps.  Cabinets line the eastern wall of the room, shelves lined with mementos of the many who have passed through these rooms.  A cool breeze filters through open windows which open to a large balcony.

title: Hearthstone, Master Bath
description: Fit for the Lord of the Manor, the walls of this bath are lined with red cedar planks at their base and topped with clean white plaster.  The centerpiece of the room is an enormous claw-footed tub which stands at the east wall of the room.  Black glaes faucets match the racks which hold thick terry towels, large enough to comfortably wrap two halflings.  The cedar in the air mixes with the scent of herbs drifting through an open window, creating a delightful treat for the senses.

title: Hearthstone, Linen Closet
description: Serving the various needs of the manor, this roomy closet is filled with all sorts of linens.  Shelves are neatly stacked with sheets and towels for the living quarters, tablecloths for the pub and clean cloths for the bar.  A supply of accessories for the bath, including lightly scented bars of soap, fills one shelf.  In one corner of the room, a steep stair, resembling a ship's ladder rises to a hatch door in the ceiling.

title: Hearthstone, Roof
description: High above the manor gardens, the roof slopes converge here, forming a small area perfectly pitched for sitting.  Raised above the slate surface, a roof hatch provides a somewhat comfortable back rest.  A warm breeze brushes the cool stone, bringing with it a hint of aromatic herbs and roasting meat.  Voices drift on the air, but they are distant and but a whisper of sound that does little to disturb this peaceful retreat.

title: Hearthstone, Guest Room
description: Comfortably furnished, this guest room is a small suite in itself.  Rich burgundy carpet and curtains are highlighted by the white plastered walls.  A large canopied bed rests against the west wall, covered with a quilted coverlet and a ruffled bed-skirt.  A small writing desk rests on the north wall complete with lightly scented note paper, an ink-well and a quill pen.  At the window, two comfortable chairs sit next to a small table with a small bouquet of fragrant herbs freshening the air.

title: Hearthstone, Rose Balcony
description: Resting high on the west wall of the manor, the source of the pleasant scent in the air is spread along the limestone railing at the edge of the balcony.  Climbing roses peek through the railing and draw the eye to the sight of the garden below.  Comfortable lounging chairs have been drawn up to the railing's edge and a table and chairs stand ready to hold an informal repast.

title: Hearthstone, Hall of Legends
description: Deep green draperies rustle between the tall leaded glass windows that line the western wall of this spacious room.  Overstuffed sofas and chairs covered in burgundy leather have been arranged to provide several casual, comfortable conversation areas for the most renowned residents of the lands.  Overhead, a massive wrought iron and crystal chandelier sways gently from a heavy chain attached to the high, polished maoral ceiling.

title: Hearthstone, Game Room
description: In vivid contrast to the rest of the manor, this room shows definite signs of wear, though the effect is not at all unpleasant.  Battered tables, some covered with green felt, have been dragged about the room to suit various purposes -- from a lively game of cards in one corner, to an odd game involving dice and shots of whiskey in another.  An old style dart board hangs upon the wall.

title: Hearthstone, Moneychanger
description: Deep green walls and dark oak furnishings give this small room an air of gracious sophistication.  A pretty elven teller smiles graciously as she conducts transactions with various customers, her hands nimbly counting out silver coins one moment, and filling out a promissory note in an elegant hand the next.

title: Hearthstone, Gemcutter
description: Though not much larger than a closet, this tiny shop is a maelstrom of activity.  Behind the counter, a diminutive clerk works constantly to wrap and package gems for shipment to the furthest reaches of Elanthia, as the gem dealer herself deals with a steady stream of customers.

title: Hearthstone, Herb Garden
description: Herbs of all types and colors are spread before you, sure to delight the most discriminating chefs and empaths, even as they delight the casual visitor to this garden.  Laid out in rectangular beds edged by walkways, the colors and textures intermingle in a seemingly untamed maze.  Stone benches are spotted throughout the garden, and in the center of the maze of walkways stands a marble statue.

title: Hearthstone, Gardener's Shack
description: A gentle breeze drifts through from the garden, carrying with it the sweet, lingering scent of herbs mingled with the distinctive perfume of roses.  Deep green tendrils of Imaera's Lace cling to the weathered boards of this small shack, occasionally loosening a cascade of delicate white florets onto the battered counter set up near the middle of the room.  An ancient gnome clad in stained work clothes shuffles among the pots and baskets, fussing over a selection of cuttings and whistling a merry tune.

title: Hearthstone, Legends' Bar
description: An antique mahogany bar gleams softly in the light cast by hurricane lamps placed at either end.  Near the large window to the west, a long, narrow table displays a wide variety of treats favored by the more elite citizens of the lands.  On the eastern wall, your attention is drawn to a handsome long mahogany shelf bearing a collection of colored crystal goblets.  In the shadow of its forerunner, a short mahogany shelf holds a single cut glass goblet.

title: West Bank, Pier
description: Crates and barrels are stacked along the end of the pier, waiting to be moved to the barges docked along the pilings.  Fishing nets ornamented with colorful floats have been strung up to dry in the fresh air, and a collection of anchors and driftwood decorates the row of homes built along the pierside with a nautical theme.

title: Halcyon Hills, Forest Glade
description: Bathed in pale moonlight, this glade is full of tall grass and brightly colored wildflowers.  Ancient trees are visible to the north and the sound of flowing water can be heard from the south.  A crisp, cool breeze ripples the grass in front of you.

title: Halcyon Hills, Lakefront
description: The trees around you are thinner here, and you find yourself standing before a large, tranquil lake.  Bright silvery moonlight dances beautifully upon the water.  Several candles can be seen floating in the distance, their pale flames barely visible.  The shrill cry of a bird suddenly pierces the silence as it flies by with a large silvery fish in its beak.

title: Halcyon Hills, Lakefront
description: Several hand-carved golden oak benches lie just before the shoreline, their wood badly weathered from time and long use.  The two benches are positioned perfectly to provide a view of the no doubt breathtaking sunsets and sunrises visible over the tranquil lake.

title: Halcyon Hills, Forest Glade
description: The grass along the path is tall and full, occasionally trodden at the edges of the path.  Wildflowers grow in several places amidst the grass and you even see several small holes, likely the burrows of some small animal or other.  A plume of bluish grey smoke is visible rising from the chimney of a small log cabin to the east.

title: Halcyon Hills, Forest Glade
description: Located roughly in the center of the glade is a small log cabin.  It seems to be made predominantly of oak, with cedar and mahogany trim.  A tall stone chimney protrudes from the roof, a wisp of grey smoke drifting from the top.  The smell of scented wax comes from the cabin's general direction.  Written above the door are the words, "Mourner's Cabin."

title: Mourner's Cabin
description: The walls of this small cabin are made from hand-carved golden oak.  Polished cedar and mahogany trim adds character to the otherwise simple appearance.  A small fire burns within a rough granite fireplace, the half-consumed logs filling the air with the pleasant scent of applewood.  Dozens of candles rest atop a large wooden table, a small apple crate, and some golden oak shelves.  Moonlight streams in through the cabin's single window, bathing the room in a pale silvery glow.

title: Halcyon Hills, Forest Glade
description: The northwesternmost corner of the glade is surrounded on three sides by oak saplings and thick brush.  Further to the north, the forest becomes thicker.  Older, even ancient, trees are visible through the sparse foliage.  A carved granite gravestone rests just before the tree line, a line of short rose bushes planted on each side.

title: Halcyon Hills, Forest Glade
description: The sound of chirping crickets fills the air and the strong scent of pine drifts on a warm breeze.  Beautifully colored leaves adorn the trees and the ground underfoot.  A small log cabin is visible to the south.

title: Halcyon Hills, Winding Trail
description: A trail winds out of the soft shadows of the glade, widening as it heads to the northeast where tall poplars can be glimpsed in the night's murk.  Where the poplars begin, the track widens into a lane.  To the south and east, the trees of the glade stand silent and still, and the darkness beneath their canopy is pierced here and there by shafts of moonlight.

title: Halcyon Hills, Avenue of Trees
description: Rows of poplar trees line both sides of a wide lane, their tall, graceful forms standing like sentries.  The way curves gently from the north to the east, disappearing into the embrace of night's shadows.  Beyond the poplars, one can glimpse a moonlit hill to the northwest.

title: Halcyon Hills, Lakefront
description: Small waves roll slowly toward you, gently striking the grass at the lake's edge.  Other than the gentle lapping of the waves and the distant chirping of crickets from the north, no sound penetrates the tranquility of this lakefront.  A single candle lies on the ground before you, its wick long burned to dust and its golden beeswax polished smooth by the water.  Dozens more float in the distance, their tiny flames all dancing in the same rhythm.

title: Halcyon Hills, Forest Glade
description: Farther from the tree line, the brush rapdily recedes and gives way to tall, bright green grass.  Multicolored leaves cover the ground in haphazard patterns.  Further to the east a tall silver fence is visible, moonlight reflecting brightly from its surface.

title: Halcyon Hills, Lakefront
description: The water of the tranquil lake sparkles brilliantly where the moonlight strikes its surface.  Barely visible in the distance, dozens of burning candles float upon the water, their tiny flames almost indistinguishable from the reflected stars.  Small waves ripple against the shore before you and a cool breeze caresses your skin.

title: Halcyon Hills, Forest Glade
description: Bright green grass suddenly gives way to a weathered cobblestone path that leads up to a polished silver gate.  A tall silver fence runs to both sides of the gate, a peaceful garden visible on the other side.  The metal is brightly polished and covered with creeping vines of ivy and dozens of small crimson flowers.  Moonlight sparkles beautifully off of the silver.

title: A Peaceful Garden
description: It is impossible not to notice that the ankle-high grass in this small garden is greener than that on the other side of the fence.  Dozens of wildflowers of countless varieties cover the ground to both sides of the path.  Creeping vines of ivy cover the polished silver gate and a large, intricately carved marble fountain stands directly in front of you.

title: A Peaceful Garden
description: Several granite benches are positioned directly in front of the intricately carved marble fountain, surrounded by a small field of flowers in full bloom.  Someone's initials are chiseled into the side of one of the benches, surrounded by a perfectly carved heart.  The tranquil gurgling of the fountain is relaxing as you take in the garden scene.

title: A Peaceful Garden
description: The grass thickens here in the southernmost part of the garden.  The dark green blades rise almost knee-high, and are interspersed with golden dandelions and several small crimson and violet wildflowers.  The cool breeze blowing off the lake makes the tiny flowers' petals seem to dance.

title: A Peaceful Garden
description: The almost overwhelming scent of wildflowers mingles on the breeze with a hint of pine.  A comfortable looking chair rests in the spot where the fence forms a corner to the northeast, and several pale green ferns are interspersed among the flowers.  The loud babbling of the carved marble fountain drowns out almost any other noise.

title: A Peaceful Garden
description: An ancient apple tree grows from the soft ground here, its gnarled boughs covered with dozens of tiny white flowers.  The sound of singing birds fills the air along with the fountain's murmur, and the scent of flowers is almost overwhelming.

title: A Peaceful Garden
description: The grass in this garden is tall and full, occasionally trodden at the edges of the path.  Wildflowers grow in several places amidst the grass and you even see a single cherry tree growing next to the fence.  Moonlight adds silvery highlights to the water spraying from the intricately carved marble fountain.

title: A Peaceful Garden
description: The ground here is spotted with dozens of bright violet stargazers and short bushes of dark crimson and pale pink roses.  A cool breeze continues to blow, its gentle touch caressing your skin.  A soft rustling sound comes from the foliage at the foot of the fence, perhaps caused by some small animal or other.

title: A Peaceful Garden
description: Moonlight sparkles off of the silver fence in the few places not covered by ivy, and upon the surface of the tranquil lake in the distance.  Water burbles and sprays from an intricately carved marble fountain to the northwest, several silver coins visible beneath the surface.  The sound of someone singing a sorrowful dirge can be heard from somewhere nearby.

title: Halcyon Hills, Avenue of Trees
description: Poplar trees lining the road create an intimate and graceful promenade, their leafy boughs waving languidly in the gentle night breezes.  Crickets fill the air with their raspy melodies, raising their song to serenade the moons hanging overhead.  The lane pursues a gentle curve, following the foot of a shadowy, forested hill to the northwest.

title: Halcyon Hills, Avenue of Trees
description: The shadowy lane lined with its handsome rows of poplars makes a gentle curve to east and southwest.  The dark boles of the trees punctuate the dense shadows beneath the boughs, darker smudges against the dusky tones.  To the east, the end of the poplars is visible, giving way to a moonlit expanse of rolling meadows.

title: Halcyon Hills, Meadow's Edge
description: An imposing double row of poplars line a moonlit lane that materializes out of grassy meadows like the beginning of a sweeping line of charcoal in an artist's sketch.  Just at the lane's birth stands a statue.  Depicting a doe, the sculpture lifts its head as though just surprised at something carried on the breeze, the animal's elegant form limed in the soft moonlight.

title: Halcyon Hills, Wooded Bluff
description: Rough weathered fieldstone steps pursue a curving path down the shadowy slope of a bluff.  Dense stands of deciduous trees gather atop the bluff, as though standing guard against the intrusion of the moonlit meadow below.  Lichens clinging to the rough surface of the trees' bark glow in the murk, as though trying to illuminate the foliage of large rhododendrons and ferns crowding at the foot of the trees.

title: Halcyon Hills, Meadow Trail
description: A moonlit trail winds through mounds of wild flowers competing with the lush grasses inhabiting the meadow.  To the west, the dark silhouettes of poplar trees offer a lighter contrast to the denser shadows of a forested hillside behind them, and, to the south, the darkness of a lake offers a fond, reflective surface to the moons above.  A single stone stele stands tall among the grasses, its sides rich with carved symbols.

title: Halcyon Hills, Forest Trail
description: A trail wends its way through a murky mix of stately oak, ash, and pine, while the dim silhouette of hawthorns loom in the lower shadows, with their flat-topped boughs and large, jagged leaves.  Visibility is limited on the trail by the dense growth of the trees as well as the lush rhododendron bushes between the boles offering fragrant sprays of blossoms that shine in the moonlight.

title: Halcyon Hills, Forest Trail
description: Meandering through the shadows of the imposing trees, the path takes a skip over a small stream gurgling across its path.  The rill's banks are cloaked in shadow, and its song graces the night.  It has the transient appearance of being short-lived, but, at the same time, an ageless, ancient quality.  The songs of frogs can be heard, their authors hidden in the moss and ferns standing guard over the water.

title: Halcyon Hills, Shaded Bench
description: The trail winds its way around a particularly large and imposing oak, which dominates the area like an ancient sovereign.  Its branches droop almost to the ground, as though arraigned in vestments heavy with jewels, and its highest branches reach through the surrounding canopy and out of sight.  A bench sits just off the trail, in the dense shadow of one of the oak's protective branches.

title: Halcyon Hills, Chorus of Ferns
description: Colossal ferns line both sides of the shadowy path, their waving fronds speckled and intricately scalloped.  In this part of the wood, the deciduous oaks, ash, and maples are giving way to an encroachment of pines and cypress.  A chorus of tree frogs and crickets fill the night with their raucous songs.

title: Halcyon Hills, Fieldstone Steps
description: The trail ends at the foot of a tall course of weathered fieldstone steps, which winds up the bluff accompanied by large hostas and ferns.  High above, a dense company of trees crowns the head of the precipice, bolstered by an impassable jumble of huge boulders and tangled blackberry thickets stretching down the incline.

title: Halcyon Hills, Flowering Bluff
description: The head of the bluff is rampant with flowers, a heady mixture of fragrant rhododendron blossoms, snow-white trillium, purple violets, and the delicate ruby bells of bleeding hearts trembling on their arched fronds.  Overhead, the wide boughs of the trees block all but a subtle beam of the moons, creating an otherworldly, ghostly light within the copse.

title: Halcyon Hills, Woodland Pool
description: The path ends at the foot of a forest pool.  A few leaves float languidly on its mirror-still surface, and beams of moonlight that are able to penetrate the heavy canopy overhead cast sparkling reflections on its surface.  At the water's north edge stands an ancient statue, the eyes looking to the distance in a timeless gaze.

title: Halcyon Hills, Aspen Thicket
description: The path winds through a shadowy growth of aspen trees.  Breezes stir the silvery leaves into a quiet murmur and give them the look of flickering silver in the moonlight.  Underfoot, thick mosses carpet the trail, muffling even the heaviest footfall, and the voices of night birds and crickets fill the night's shadows.

title: Halcyon Hills, Aspen Thicket
description: The trail widens into a circle beneath a thick, shadowy cover of aspen boughs.  There stands an immense arch, its pillars densely carved with sigils.  The surface is pitted with time.  Its incongruous location, beneath the graceful aspen canopy, implies the unpredictability of life's paths and the finality of the last gateway.

title: Halcyon Hills, Rough-Hewn Steps
description: At the foot of a bluff traversed by rough-hewn fieldstone steps, the path ends.  A stand of aspens gather to the northwest, their silvery leaves fluttering in a light breeze playing in the moonlight.  At the top of the steps, a shadowy fringe of pines seems to look down on the oaks, ashes, and aspens with a disdainful air, while huge ferns and hostas guard the stair with their imposing fronds.

title: Halcyon Hills, Piney Overlook
description: The bluff's elevation provides a spectacular panoramic view of the moonlit countryside.  Meadowlands stretch away to the east, and the indigo water of a lake mirrors the moons in wavering reflections.  A thick stand of pines scents the air with their pleasant aroma, and, underfoot, the ground is covered with a russet coat of their fallen needles.  The faint outline of a structure can dimly be seen through the trees to the northeast.

title: Halcyon Hills, Stand of Pines
description: The graceful boles of the pines are generously situated with plenty of room for their sweeping boughs, almost as though each had been individually placed by a master gardener.  Here and there, a few oaks have invaded the piney host, their leaves a pleasing contrast to the spiny conifer foliage.  To the northeast stands a domed grotto comprised of lichen-covered fieldstone, its configuration that of a crescent with its opening facing the eastern horizon.

title: Halcyon Hills, Serene Grotto
description: The grotto is quiet, protected by the fieldstone walls that surround it and create an overhang above, stretching around to protect the eastern entrance with their lichen-covered arms.  Water flows down the back of the grotto, tripping over the stones and falling into a dark pool beneath.  The pool's surface ripples softly, hiding the secrets of its depths with a constant undulation.  A statue stands at the side of the pool, its visage stoic and its secrets lost in time.

title: Meadow Trail, Trail Fork
description: The meadow spreading out all around is peaceful and still in the moonlight, except for an occasional breeze ruffling the tall grasses.  Dark silhouettes of distant trees rim the large field, while nearby the shadowy bulk of small boulders lurk.  Stretching out overhead in all its glory is the night sky, with a multitude of stars twinkling in the ebon vastness.

title: Arboretum, Forest Path
description: The leaf-covered path wanders through an area in transition.  Large tree specimens from the arboretum are surrounded by wild seedlings trying to stake out their territory, while sword ferns and underbrush have already established their domain.  A large moss-covered maple has fallen nearby, its roots at the base of the giant trunk flaring high into the air.

title: Meadow, Forest's Edge
description: The meadow fades into forest here as magnificent trees, keepers of ancient secrets, rise up on either side of the trail.  Lush grasses gradually give way to ferns and berry bushes, and the rustling of small animals occasionally breaks the tranquility of the woodland.

title: Forest, Fallen Log
description: A fallen log half blocks the passage in to the forest.  It has been awhile since the tree fell -- the log is rotting and slightly damp.  At first glance it appears dead, though a closer look reveals that it is actually teeming with life.  Small ants scurry across the surface while a brightly colored beetle chases them down.

title: Arboretum, Maple Bower
description: Branches of bright green vine maples rise up from either side of the trail, arcing overhead and meeting in the middle to form a private bower.  Dappled moonlight filters through the leaves, lighting the surroundings in a soft silvery blue.  A cedar bench provides a place for rest or private reflection.

title: Arboretum, Path
description: Flowering shrubs of all sorts are intermixed with verdant evergreen bushes to create a balanced palette of color to be enjoyed by those wandering the wide dirt path.  Stately oaks and elms fill the open places a bit farther back from the trail, and a glimpse of what looks like a fruit orchard can be seen in the distance.

title: Arboretum, Memory Boulder
description: Statuesque deciduous trees of several varieties are scattered to either side of the wide dirt path, while lush green grass carpets the ground in between the leafy giants, creating an inviting park-like setting.  The silvery glow of moonlight filters through branches overhead, illuminating a small granite boulder with a green marble plaque set into it.

title: Arboretum, Meadow
description: Trees fall away as the trail wanders along the edge of a large meadow.  Tall grasses sway in a light breeze as wildflowers of all colors spring up in a vibrant display.  The throaty voices of frogs can be heard as bats flit and dart through the air.  In the distance, the silhouetted outline of mountains can be seen.

title: Garden, Wildflowers
description: The garden is walled in by a tall green hedge that has been carefully maintained to a crisp, squared-off trim.  Beds on either side of the arch are filled with an impressive display of wildflowers.  At the front are low ground creepers with tiny purple-blue flowers, and in the back are the tall spears of foxglove and fireweed.  A low wrought-iron border keeps visitors on the crushed gravel path and out of the flowers.

title: Arboretum, Wooded Path
description: The path here is coated with dry, brown needles fallen from coniferous trees.  Tall modwirs, firs, and pines ascend to the sky, as the occasional aspen flickers its colorful leaves.  The air is filled with the whispering of wind passing through high, needle-laden branches, and the sound of running water comes from nearby.  Sticking out from behind one of the tree trunks is what looks like a large brown ear.

title: Garden, Rose Beds
description: This entire section is filled with roses of almost every color and variety.  The collection is extraordinary, including some rare elven specimens from the east.  The bushes have been staked and pruned with great care, and the large, showy blossoms indicate the plants are thriving with the expert attention of the gardeners.

title: Garden, Statue
description: Not as lush and colorful as the rest, this part of the garden is dominated by a larger-than-life statue of two female warriors with their arms wrapped around each other's shoulders in easy camaraderie.  A green lawn, sprinkled with small white daisies and bright yellow buttercups, surrounds the base of the statue.

title: Garden, Fountain
description: A large, many-tiered fountain immediately attracts attention, obviously intended as a centerpiece for the garden as it rises high into the air.  The neatly tended beds surrounding the courtyard are full of pansies and other small, brightly hued flowers.  Fancifully carved marble benches are set around the perimeter, providing a spot for visitors to rest and enjoy the display.

title: Garden, Eternal Flame
description: This niche is striking because of its austerity.  A tall, dark green hedge encloses the small square on three sides, its foliage contrasting with the white crushed gravel underfoot.  The only object is a giant mithril oil lamp in the shape of a bowl set on an elevated granite pedestal.  Flames leap high into the air from the surface of the bowl in a never-ending dance of light.

title: Garden, Butterflies
description: The flowers here have been planted specifically to attract a wide assortment of butterflies.  The vegetation grows in large, colorful clumps of asters, daylilies, goldenrod, milkweed, verbena, and marigolds.  However, no activity is present in the cool darkness of the night.

title: Arboretum, Lakeshore
description: The path ends here at a small sandy beach along the shore of a lake, the water looking deep and black in the darkness.  A light breeze sends the boughs of a nearby willow tree swaying and creates ripples on the dark surface.  Moonlight glints off the ripples in a dazzling display.  The occasional song of a distant night bird and the rhythmic sound of small waves lapping at the shore make this a peaceful resting spot.

title: Arboretum, Stream Bank
description: The trail ends abruptly at the edge of a swift stream.  Lichen-covered granite lines the bank, and mossy round stones can be seen under the water.  The brook foams white where it passes around obstacles and is crystal clear in the small pools and eddies.  Moonlight streams through the trees, reflecting off the creek with a silvery brilliance.

title: Arboretum, Middle of the Stream
description: This large rock is flat and dry, providing a nice place to stop and rest midstream.  The brook rushes quickly past on both sides, foaming white around the edges of this perch.  A small pool forms on the downstream side of the rock with an occasional fish darting through the cool green depths.  The musical sound of water cascading over stones combines with the song of nearby birds to create a forest melody.

title: Remembrance Ridge, Stream Bank
description: Leaves blanket the ground, creating a slippery climb up a steep hillside, leading to the peak of a ridge.  Low branches extend out, serving as handholds for traversing the slope as the minimal path winds between fallen boulders and trees.  A swift stream rushes along its channel at the base of the rise.

title: Remembrance Ridge
description: Trees begin to give way to low brush, fragrant with woodland scents.  Wild honeysuckles entwine the hand-shaped leaves of sassafras, as ripening huckleberries add a dash of purple to the earthy hues.  A narrow, cleared trail makes its way along the ridgeline like a meandering snake.

title: Remembrance Ridge
description: As the trees thin out, moonlight flashes upon the still water of Lake Eonak.  The silhouette of Melgorehn's Reach rises suddenly, like a watchtower guarding the port of Wehnimer's Landing.  To the southwest, the gloomy spires of Darkstone Castle are backlit with a ghostly hue.

title: Remembrance Ridge, Promontory
description: Jutting out from the promontory of the end of the ridgeline, this overlook of barren rock provides a spectacular viewpoint.  Placed here for those wanting respite or a moment to enjoy the scenery, a crude wooden bench faces the northwest stretch of the valley.  At the tip of the bluff, a break in the treeline reveals a switchback trail leading down the hillside.

title: Hidden Canyon, Switchback
description: Tall trees line both sides of a wide and rocky path, a mixture of grey-barked haon mingling with shingle monirs, quaking aspens, and silvery beeches to create a thick canopy overhead.  Slivers of moonlight strike the forest floor in thin beams, lending to the stillness of the setting, broken by the occasional hoot of an owl.

title: Memory Peak, Rocky Ledge
description: Splintered walls of rock create a deep chasm where once an old trail existed.  Below, all that can be seen is a carvernous dark void.  An arching stone bridge hugs close to the rocky climb, connecting up with a prominent ledge.

title: Memory Peak, Rocky Trail
description: Small rocks and rounded dusty pebbles make this trail a bit hazardous, but the ghostly illusion of the white ice dome off in the distance serves as a reward for a journey completed.  A small cavern entrance provides a bit of shelter.

title: Memorial Cavern
description: The narrow entrance opens up into a small, dry cavern.  Many niches are carved into the solid rock walls, and stone biers ring the roughly circular floor.  Candles set into elaborate mithril sconces illuminate the area, but the ceiling is high enough to be lost in darkness.  In the center of the cavern is a large stone altar that is chiseled into the shape of an anvil.

title: Memory Peak, Outlook
description: Turning sharply, the trail shifts to offer a view of Remembrance Ridge, an overlook that leans out perilously over the severe drop to the forest below.  To the north, moonlight illuminates palely as it touches something reflective.

title: Dome of Memories
description: Clearly out of place in this temperate climate, a glistening dome of ice invites a closer look.  The massive structure resembles a giant faceted diamond.  Moonlight glances off the surface, softly illuminating the building.

title: Dome of Memories
description: Frost-covered trees greet visitors to the garden, each of their leaves lightly dusted with a glittering layer of snow.  Fragile icicles dangle from the branches, many long enough to reach the ground.  A lone wooden bench faces the tallest of the trees and looks to be an ideal spot for contemplation.

title: Dome of Memories
description: A grand winding staircase rises up from the forest and leads to an observatory.   Each step is made from crystal clear ice, yet they don't seem to be slippery.  There are no hand rails or walls, but the staircase is wide enough to be quite safe.

title: Dome of Memories
description: Decorative crescent openings in the ceiling grant a view of the sky above.  Moonlight filters through the openings, softly illuminating the chamber.  A small white owl rests nearby, alert but unafraid.  Its song is repetitive, but reassuring.

title: Dome of Memories
description: A sturdy rope bridge leads from the observatory to the pond, its elevated vantage allowing an excellent view of the northern part of the enclosure.  Several colorful gardens are visible, each small but well-tended.  Amidst one of the flower beds, a silver cat playfully chases a butterfly.

title: Dome of Memories
description: Nestled between two small drifts of snow is an oval pond bordered by riverstone and miniature roses.  Candles float across its surface, their gentle illumination dancing amidst the rippled water.  Slender silver fish dart back and forth, occasionally stopping to nibble an errant leaf.

title: Dome of Memories
description: Spanning the observatory and fountain is a delicate arch formed from layered opalescent moonstone.  Each piece has been handcrafted, many of them actually cut to curve over the others.  Hummingbirds flitter overhead, their tiny forms darting to and fro in a harmony of movement.

title: Dome of Memories
description: A tall fountain rises above the frost, crafted in the image of a dozen roses set in a crystal vase.  Loose petals made from iridescent crimson silk dusted with fire opal dewdrops float on the water's surface.  Scented honey-colored candles illuminate the shrine, their soft aroma hinting at floral overtones.

title: Dome of Memories
description: A flagstone path bisects the small stream and continues down a gentle slope.  A glance downward reveals a large clearing dominated by a sizeable ice fountain.  Slender trees adorned with silver chimes line the path, the soft tinkle of the metal on metal pleasant and soothing.

title: Dome of Memories
description: Tiny yellow and white flowers blanket both sides of the small stream cascading across this ice-covered field.  A rainbow of butterflies hover about the flowers, their movements creating an everchanging portrait of color against the snowy white backdrop.  A pair of curved wooden benches face each other, allowing for soft conversation or peaceful meditation.

title: Hidden Canyon, Switchback
description: A sharp switchback turns here as the path negotiates a steep climb, the earthy banks along the inner side slowing eroding and exposing gnarled roots from ancient tree growth towering above.  Tiny pebbles on the narrow path make walking along the incline a bit of a challenge.

title: Hidden Canyon, Switchback
description: Breaks in the surrounding forest canopy offer glimpses of solid dark expanses above and below, with only the occasional soft moonbeam to guide a steady foot along the twisting path.

title: Hidden Canyon, Switchback
description: Slender aspens and birches stand sentry to the taller haon and monir trees, marking the change from meadow to forest at this juncture with the switchback path.  Varying lengths of moonbeams glow softly like pale candles, lighting the way as the dirt road climbs up from the valley floor.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Valley
description: A wide expanse of verdant meadow extends out to a silhouetted riparian buffer ringing the canyon and obscuring the trail weaving alongside a meandering creek.  The stillness of the night air allows the soft babbling sounds of the water to wash over the field, while the starry sky above intrigues even the most novice astronomer.  Several marble arbors are lit with oil lamps, providing refuge from inclement weather or merely a peaceful setting for quiet contemplation.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Valley
description: Stretching from canyon wall to canyon wall, tall grass waves in the gentle night air like a dark ocean.  Several marble-columned arbors stand discreetly distant from each other, their flickering oil lanterns adding a touch of warmth to the peaceful settings for those gathering here.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Trail
description: The lush riparian growth accompanying the slow creek tapers off to a small stand of chaparral, as the thinning stream slips into a narrow crevice in the wall of rock that surrounds much of the canyon.  Three glorious waterfalls spill forth from the plateau above, each uniquely different.  Silvery moonlight is reflected from each, like the sparkling facets of a pure diamond.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Arbor
description: Grey-green serpentine rock streaked with white quartz and flecked with silvery mica is carved to form a low three-sided wall resembling a leafy bower.  Ivy-twined poles at the four corner points shoot up to suspend a canopy of sheer gossamer, and the fabric shimmers with a ghostly glow in the moonlight.  Two baskets of draping fragrant jasmine add just the right touch to the peaceful setting.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Valley
description: Pale sandstone cliffs encircle the valley floor, ghostly in the moonlight, and plumed with a dark crown of trees running along the ridgeway.  The sound of several waterfalls echo in the darkness, but the sound is somewhat soothing.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Arbor
description: Pink marble columns streaked with white quartz, black obsidian, and flecks of silvery mica hide beneath a lattice roof thickly covered with honeysuckle vines.  Sheltered by the trees that hug the creek at the base of the cliffs, the small arbor hides from the moonlight, yet still gazes out over the meadow domed with a star-filled sky.  The susurrus of rushing water nearby marks a small trailhead to the south.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Trailhead
description: A small clearing gives way to a narrow southeasterly trail that traces along a rushing creek.  Rounded stones in a myriad of hues line the bed of the waterway, some built up in spots to create small burbling fountains.  Moonlight drifting down through the leafy canopy overhead playfully sparkles on the glistening protrusions.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Trail
description: The trail splits here, crossing over the creek by way of an arrangement of small stepping stones, framing the shallow sloping banks hiding under bordering trees.  Wintergreen and watercress grow in abundance amid the thick moss buffering the twin shores.  The outer trail continues under the riparian tunnel ringing the canyon, while the inner trail moves off towards Archer Falls.

title: Archer Falls, Basin
description: Relentless pounding fury fills this pool at the basin of Archer Falls.  Cooling spray can be felt even at the farthest reach this close to the trail, the direct result of the arching white cascade.  A jutting ledge at the top of the falls forces the roaring water to fan out, extending like a well-tuned bow for which it has been named.  A small rock shelf from a parallel cliff wall can be reached in a short climb, promising a magnificent view.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Trail
description: The sound of Archer Falls is almost deafening, its cascade visible in part through breaks in the trees.  The creek turns here, widening and picking up speed as it courses alongside the trail.  A decaying tree trunk that once blocked its path has created a tiny pool that spills over the lichen-covered wood in a silvery curtain.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Trail
description: Black-striped silvery white bark from beech trees shimmers in the moonlight, with their leafy crowns interlacing above as they lean in towards each other from the opposing stream banks.  A solitary owl hoots from its nearby perch, breaking the hypnotic stillness created by the rushing water.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Arbor
description: Standing out from the main trail, columns of grey-blue marble streaked with pyrite and serpentine support a pale haon cross-beam roof.  Spiraled cypress trees stand tall, extending out like wings from two sides of the arbor.  Nearby, the soft sound of Leaping Falls serves as a backdrop to the view of the starlit sky extending out above.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Trail
description: Curving back under the trees that line the creek, the trail resumes its faithful path after snaking out into the meadow towards a grey-blue marble arbor.  Leaping Falls can be viewed through the birches and aspens that crowd along the waterway.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Trail
description: A branch of the trail parts company here with the creekside, crossing over a small wooden bridge, while the other remains faithful and continues to run along the cliff base.  Moonlight fills the small clearing on the other side, where a ring of jumbled rocks have fallen from above.

title: Leaping Falls, Basin
description: Tall and graceful, this triple-step waterfall cascades from tier to tier, moving down the cliff wall in gentle leaps.  Rock shelves extend out, catching the thin streaming spray in a shallow pool that spills over the downsloping side.  Twice more the falls are snagged, until it washes down the remaining canyon wall, to constantly renew the clear basin.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Trail
description: At this point in the trail, halfway around the valley floor, the forested switchback wedge that leads into this remote cul-de-sac is barely visible, even with all three moons full and bright.  The sandstone cliffs enclose the wildflower-filled field like a coliseum.  Tree-sheltered trails lead off in two directions, leading back the way you came, or onward to complete the circle.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Trail
description: Circling perfectly here is a small stand of aspens, the undersides of the spade-like leaves a soft silver in the moonlight.  At the center, a large river stone sits, its top flat like an altar and holding many offerings from those who have visited.  The trail continues behind the grove, running alongside the creek that rings the valley floor.

title: Archer Falls, Ledge
description: Not as narrow a precipice as it seems from below, this rock shelf can easily hold several people and is directly across from the widest point of the arching waterfall.  Down below, foamy water churns in a deep basin, then runs off into a creek that encircles the canyon floor.  Above, the fine mist picks out a pale moonbow that forms from the soft lunar light.

title: Leaping Falls, Boulders
description: A series of boulders work to create steps to this small crown, the top of which is covered with lush moss, thriving heartily from the near constant moisture in the air.  Level with the last tier, the view of the clear pool below provides an excellent vantage to watch errant swimmers ducking in and out of the moonlight.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Arbor
description: The trail breaks at this junction, circling a white marble arbor veined with pale pink granite and vibrant carnelian.  Tightly closed cream-hued passionflowers are partially hidden amid their lush green foliage as they climb the four corner pillars and creep along the open-weave ora mesh above.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Trail
description: A small riverstone cairn sits alongside the trail here, but, rather than serve as a burial mound, the rocks provide a bier for the recently succumbed and mourned.  Trees and brush have been cleared away, creating a small amphitheater for the grieving in attendance.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Trail
description: Rushing water from nearby Gladiator Falls creates a soft roar, muffled by a baffle of tall, speckled alders lining this well-worn trail.  Pale violet lady slippers flourish at the base of the taller trees, their delicate blossoms gently shivering at the slightest breeze.  The trail splits here, with part of the path heading southwest to the waterfall.

title: Gladiator Falls, Basin
description: Only found by way of a narrow break in the surrounding trees, the round clearing provides an impressive setting for the wide, crescent-shaped waterfall.  Stones ring the basin, like seats in an arena, covered along the top with thick moss encouraged by the perpetual misty spray.  Jutting out from the rockface behind the cascading water, a wide ledge creates just enough shelter for those who dare to wander close.

title: Gladiator Falls, Cave
description: Deafening thunder from the torrents of water makes conversation difficult here, yet provides an awesome display of the raw power of Gladiator Falls.  Sound echoes against arched walls hollowed by the elements.

title: Contemplation Canyon, Trail
description: Several young bay laurels grow upon the creek bank, their pungent spicy scent released as squirrels and birds rustle the leaves.  Spore-dotted ferns arranged in knee-high clumps follow the meandering route of the trickling flow.

title: Forest, Wooden Bridge
description: An arched wooden bridge has been constructed to provide safe and dry passage over the rushing creek that winds through the center of this forest.  A footpath starts at the base of the bridge and meanders through the forest heading north.

title: Forest, Wooden Bridge
description: A small patch of moonlight peeks through the lush forest canopy overhead, creating a beam of light right at the base of an oak tree.  Dozens of wildflowers are illuminated by the beam, blooming thicker here than most other places in the forest.  Built over a wide rushing creek is a small wooden bridge.

title: Forest, Dusty Path
description: Lazily winding between the tall trees is a dusty path covered in footprints and animal tracks.  The muted sounds of birds chirping and the wind rustling in the trees drifts through the area.

title: Peaceful Meadow, Forest Edge
description: The forest opens up here to an enormous meadow stretching as far as the eye can see.  Tall green grass sways softly in the wind, and the stars overhead twinkle in the moonlight.

title: Peaceful Meadow, Creek
description: Scampering quickly across the meadow, a sleek cinnamon-colored rabbit rushes towards a thicket.  Several small boulders, perfectly sized to sit on and relax on a sunny afternoon, are scattered about the meadow.  The soothing sound of creek water rushing over a bed of pebbles wafts through the air.

title: Peaceful Meadow, Boulder
description: Moving slowly across the meadow is a busy trail of shiny black ants.  They wind around blades of grass, pebbles, and twigs towards a small anthill built adjacent to a boulder where people often rest.

title: Peaceful Meadow, High Grass
description: As a gust of wind moves through the area, it picks up fallen leaves and dozens of flower petals, creating an amazing rainbow of color that swirls about high up in the air.  The grass here is high, above the knees of the average giantman, and a luscious green in color.

title: Peaceful Meadow, Oak Tree
description: Standing alone in the center of this peaceful meadow is a gigantic oak tree.  Wildflowers have grown haphazardly throughout the grass creating an array of colors that spreads across the entire meadow.  Off in the distance a small group of tawny deer can be seen grazing, with an enormous buck keeping watch.

title: Meadowlands, Shepherd's Way
description: A fat rolton, looking much cleaner and less vicious than his less domesticated brothers outside the fence, rests in the sun by the side of the road, munching happily on the thick grass.  The aroma of roasting meat wafting over from a nearby cottage doesn't seem to interfere with his appetite.

title: Meadowlands, Shepherd's Way
description: A row of bright sunflowers, as tall as a human, grow along the stone wall, turning their brilliant yellow petals to the light.  Two young roltons scamper in the grass near the trail, leaping and bounding in a pile of white fluff.

title: Meadowlands, Shepherd's Way
description: The trail ends here in a grassy mound that rises into a plateau of pastureland spreading out to the south.  A narrow cobblestone path winds east into a cluster of small wooden buildings and thatched cottages.

title: Meadowlands, Pasture
description: An expanse of field extends to the south, bounded by a low wooden fence that winds and curves through the rolling grasslands.  The pasture grass is cropped short by the grazing herds of rolton that wander here and there.  Several cottages are set near the path, surrounded by small picket fences to keep the roltons out of the flowerbeds.

title: Meadowlands, Pasture
description: A small stream bubbles through the corner of the pasture, surrounded by several small cottages set near the place where it passes under the fence.  A shepherdess rests on a rock downstream, dangling her toes in the gurgling water as she watches over her wooly charges.

title: Meadowlands, Pasture
description: An expanse of green field lies all around the path, dotted with the white fluffy bodies of grazing roltons.  Several thatched cottages stand by the wooden fence that bounds the area.  A small pack of sheepdog puppies scamper in the grass, fighting over a scrap of cloth.  A cobblestoned path leads north into a small village.

title: Meadowlands, Village
description: A large chateau stands beneath the branches of an ancient oak, enjoying the shade of its expansive boughs.  Children run pell-mell around the structure, dodging dogs and geese.  A number of doors leading into chambers within the stronghold claim small gardens fronting them, full of roses and day-lilies.

title: Meadowlands, Shepherd's Way
description: A quaint cobbled road is bordered by a fieldstone wall and cabins spaced along its way.  Generous poplar trees shade the thoroughfare, and lush yew bushes edge its perimeter.  On either side, the cabins are shingled with slate tiles.  The buildings are well-fashioned and tidy, and project a prosperous image.

title: Meadowlands, Village
description: A large structure rises from the sea of prairie grass like an immense ship sailing the wide ocean.  The perimeter of the structure is studded with doors, their surfaces polished to luster.  A couple of other large edifices lift towers nearby, creating an island in the midst of the vast meadowlands.

title: Meadowlands, Village
description: A cluster of houses is surrounded by lush fields, their patchwork perimeters bounded by borders of dark green trees.  The buildings are charming, thatched roofs and bright colored shutters characterizing them.  Rock chimneys spout wispy clouds of smoke, the masonry of the flues well-wrought and the rock obviously quarried from nearby.

title: Meadowlands, Pasture
description: Prairie grass nourishes the rolton grazing across the expanse of green.  The herds stretch to the horizon, moving across the meadowlands in wandering, wooly clumps.  The prevalent white of the fleeces is dotted with black specimens here and there.  Cabins dot the countryside, spaced generously apart as if grateful for the ample province.

title: Meadowlands, Rolton Pens
description: Scrub hawthorn branches have been fashioned into corrals for milling herds of roltons, their bleats echoing off a fringe of buildings circling the pens.  The animals bare their formidable teeth at each other, frightened into confrontation by their confinement.  A few lanky youngsters hang from the rungs of the fences, eyeing the animals and commenting on the quality of their fleeces.

title: Meadowlands, Field
description: The grass grows longer here, as if the uneven ground and scattered rocks make it less appetizing to the grazing roltons.  Patches of wildflowers and colorful weeds grow here and there among the stones.  The ground rises sharply to the east into a low hill.

title: Meadowlands, Grassy Knoll
description: Thick green grass covers the hilltop, much to the delight of a stray rolton who wanders lazily amid the cottages and berry bushes, munching happily.  The higher ground here affords a view of the surrounding fields and pastures and the woodlands beyond.

title: Meadowlands, Prairie
description: Grasslands grow in a golden sea of verdure to the horizon.  The prairie is omniscient, its largess nourishing roving herds of rolton.  In the foreground, a few cottages rise from the waving field of grasses, their thatched roofs meshing seamlessly with the fields.  Stands of trees cut through the plush expanse where streams meander through the prairie grass, hidden but for their plume of vegetation.

title: Meadowlands, Village
description: The lane passes a large building which commands a circular square in front of it.  Doors ring the perimeter of the structure, revealing its interior to be a catacomb of residences.  People pass in and out of its fastness, calling out congenial greetings to one another.

title: Meadowlands, Field
description: Fields of tall grass extend to the east, past the low stone wall that bounds the field.  Deep green clover covers the ground, speckled with blossoms of pink and white, and a few scattered trees provide a little shade around a cluster of rustic cottages.

title: Meadowlands, Field
description: A heavy forest bounds the area to the south, bordered by a low stone wall that stands along the edge of a deep, tree-shaded ravine.  Several cottages stand in the shade near the wall, surrounded by clumps of white and yellow wildflowers.

title: Meadowlands, Overlook
description: A flat bluff offers a spectacular view of the surrounding countryside.  Homes perch upon the majestic hillside, their faces pointed toward the far horizons.  Prairie grass grows up to the cabins' doors, a rich carpet of green that reigns supreme on the meadowlands' rich soil.

title: Meadowlands, Glade
description: A few birch trees huddle together to create a small glade, their silvery trunks reflecting the gold of the expansive meadow grass surrounding the oasis of shade.  Cabins lurk beneath the trees, their shingled roofs stained moss-green with dew from the boughs.  Trails leading up to the doors of the residences are won from the prairie grass by constant surveillance, and are perilous at best.

title: West Bank, Pier
description: Seagulls perch on the heavy stone pilings, ruffling their feathers and diving into the river after the small silver fish that roam around the pier in glistening schools.  Several homes have been built on the riverside along the pier, their small yards ornamented with fishing gear and brightly colored banners that flap in the fresh breeze.

title: West Bank, Pier
description: The wooden pier extends to the north, set on heavy stone pilings rooted in the riverbank.  Merchant barges are berthed along the pier, loading and unloading a variety of crates and barrels.  A group of gaily dressed workmen bustle around a large canvas tent, which seems to be in the process of being taken down or put up.

title: West Bank Pier, Tent
description: Poles, ropes, and huge sheets of brightly-colored canvas lie scattered about the dock.  A group of giantmen, wearing sleeveless leather vests and well-worn pants, move about, working industriously to put up the immense tent.  Performers gather to practice among the hustle and bustle, perfecting their acts for an upcoming show.

title: Rampant Rat Table
description: On the wall hangs a painted wooden crest depicting a rat rampant.  Teeth bared, the rat balances precariously on its hind legs.  Hanging slightly askew, the crest is surely meant as a jest.

title: Melgorehn's Crossing, Riverbank
description: The trees along the riverbank thin, forming a small glade ringed with cottages at the water's edge.  The grass is lush there, a deep green carpeting sprinkled with the occasional pastel blossom.

title: Melgorehn's Crossing, Glade
description: Grand cottages have been erected along the borders of the glade.  They quite obviously belong to the rich or noble, such is the quality of their construction.  People stroll along a cobblestone walkway that proceeds north and east.  Lining the walkway, split log benches offer a comfortable resting spot from which to enjoy the soothing drone of the river.  At the center of the clearing, a carved wooden statue of a water sprite stares back at you.

title: Ravenswood, Gates
description: A thick forest of fel, pine, and yew trees lies in both directions down the winding, well-kept path.  A few cottages stand along the border of the dark woods, situated so as to take advantage of the patch of sunlight here.  Wildflowers grow among patches of grass, and clinging vines cover the wrought-iron fence that surrounds the area.

title: Ravenswood, Forest
description: A glimmer of sunlight can be seen to the northeast, but the forest here is dark and thick, and little light seeps through the heavy canopy of trees.  The air is heavy with the scent of jasmine growing among the small houses that stand scattered through the woods, and a raven cries somewhere in the distance.

title: Ravenswood, Forest
description: The heavy iron fence that borders the area winds to the west, covered with masses of thick green vines.  Closely spaced trees form a dark canopy of leaves over the path, and patches of lilies of the valley form fragrant splashes of white in the shade.

title: Ravenswood, Forest
description: The path winds through a deep grove of ancient yew trees, their branches forming a thick blanket that nearly blocks out the sun.  Glimmers of candlelight can be seen in the windows of houses set back among the trees, even in daytime.

title: Ravenswood, Winding Path
description: A wrought-iron fence bounds the area to the north, bordered by a grove of fel trees, their branches casting flickering shadows on the dark soil of the path.  Patches of deep green grass surround the cottages set between the trees, nurtured by the rich soil.

title: Ravenswood, Winding Path
description: Several ancient grey stones rest beneath the trees, half-buried by the shifting ground over the centuries.  On closer examination, they appear to be grave-markers, though any inscriptions have long since been worn away.  The path continues along the iron fence to the northeast, and a narrow trail leads into a dark glade to the east.  A small clearing lies to the south.

title: Ravenswood, Dark Trail
description: Dark yew trees close in on the path, blocking almost all light from above.  Glimmers of candles and lamps can be seen through the windows of the cottages nestled among the underbrush, and thick moss covers the ground beneath your feet.

title: Ravenswood, Winding Path
description: The dark iron fence that bounds the wooded path is covered with deep green vines that wind in and around its latticework, covering the blackened metal with a network of foliage.  Ancient yews and gnarled oaks bend over the path, and the faint call of some forest bird in the distance is the only sound.

title: Ravenswood, Dark Trail
description: The trail curves sharply around a thick patch of jasmine bushes, which fill the air with the heady scent of their blossoms.  The faint light that filters through the branches above speckles the mossy path with dark green patterns.

title: Ravenswood, Streambank
description: A shallow stream bubbles through the forest, bounded by banks of green moss on both sides.  Ancient willows lean over the gurgling water, their leaves nearly meeting the cool, shaded ground.  A set of smooth stepping stones forms a slippery path across the stream.

title: Ravenswood, Winding Path
description: The ancient stone wall of the graveyard rises behind the trees to the east, its rough surface etched with symbols and charms to ward the dark forces that dwell within.  The mossy trail curves along the wall, shaded by the thick overhanging trees.

title: Ravenswood, Winding Path
description: Blackened vines, twisted by some dark force, climb the heavy stone of the graveyard wall that bounds the eastern side of the trail.  Blackbirds roost along the branches of an ancient oak, the flock cawing in unison as if to call out to the dead beyond the wall.

title: Ravenswood, Streambank
description: Mossy banks line both sides of the bubbling stream that disappears into a pile of stones near the graveyard wall, connected by a small stone footbridge.  Willows sway in the slight breeze, forming a canopy of leaves over the bridge, and several small homes are set in the cool shadows among the trees.

title: Ravenswood, Forest
description: An ancient pile of moss-covered stones, stacked in a pyramid as tall as a halfling, stands in a hollow by the side of the path.  Leafy branches form a thick canopy overhead, and a forest bird cries somewhere in the distance.

title: Ravenswood, Forest
description: Small paths lead off the trail to cottages nestled between the ancient trunks of the oaks and pines, surrounded by patches of deep green ferns.  The forest is silent but for the soft cries of unseen birds.

title: Wehnimer's, East Jetty End
description: The jetty ends here in jagged steps leading up to the tarnished brass tower, its doors hanging ajar on torn and twisted hinges.  At the tip of the breakwater, the spray of the waves and the salt breeze wash away the dirt and commotion of the town.

title: Brass Tower, Entrance
description: Cold and damp, the tower interior is smaller than expected though roomy enough to feel comfortable even in a large group.  The smell of the sea is still strong here, providing a musty flavor to the air.  A circular stairway leads to a landing above you, but the upper portion of it is scorched and twisted.

title: Brewery, Vat Room
description: This is the fermentation room of the brewery.  Old oaken vats banded with iron form two rows with narrow aisles along both walls.  Brewers weave between them, climbing up short stepladders to take samples or add ingredients.  Full casks filled of aged ale and beer awaiting transport stand by the mouth of a corridor.

title: Brewery, Secret Room
description: You smile as you enter this cool and pleasant secret room.  A small table next to an overstuffed velvet armchair bears a few rare vintages and some premier products of the brewery.  Several rock crystal glasses of Gnollish design, a brass corkscrew and a silver salver rest on a rack against the wall.

title: Alchemist's House, Alcove
description: Within this tiny alcove, the alchemist grudgingly takes her rest, pausing from her studies only when at the verge of exhaustion.  An elegant handmade quilt embroidered with an assortment of colorful flowers lies rumpled on the cot.  A globed lantern rests on the corner of the polished mahogany nightstand bathing the room in a soft glow.

title: Shallimar's Magic Shoppe
description: Beneath a vaulted ceiling, a twisted iron sconce hangs on one of the mahogany paneled walls.  A vine-carved mahogany table and a gilded maple cabinet sit in opposite corners while a woven Vornavian silk rug rests on the black marble floor.

title: Dgry's Magic Shoppe
description: Enclosed by varnished ebonwood walls, the shop features a bronzed drake sculpture in the center of its black marble floor.  A ruby-eyed grinning skull hangs under the beam ceiling.  Right near the front is a gold-leafed mistwood cabinet and a long mistwood counter.

title: Hevalt's Weaponry
description: Beneath a raised fel panel ceiling, a blue watered silk tapestry hangs on one of the mahogany paneled walls.  A vine-carved mahogany table and a bamboo rack sit in opposite corners while a bronzed drake sculpture rests on the oak floor.

title: Xanith's Magic Shoppe
description: Beneath a vaulted ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the varnished ebonwood walls.  A glass-topped mistwood counter and a bamboo rack sit in opposite corners while a pile of striped throw pillows rests on the oak floor.

title: Karlyna's Outfitting
description: A blue watered silk tapestry hangs on one of the polished oak walls, and a mosaic tiled ceiling rises overhead.  A pile of striped throw pillows sits in one corner of a polished oak floor.  There is a flexible willow woven basket on one side of the shop and an oval-shaped speckled marble counter on the other.

title: Vindicate's Armory
description: Polished oak walls rise from the black marble floor.  Just above a bronzed drake sculpture hangs a midnight blue rising phoenix tapestry, and a vaulted ceiling completes the picture.  A gilded maple cabinet and a glass-topped mistwood counter stand side by side in the middle of the room.

title: Vindicate's General Store
description: Enclosed by varnished ebonwood walls, the shop features a scaled model of Hearthstone in the center of its black marble floor.  A blue watered silk tapestry hangs under the tiled ceiling.  Right near the front is a gilded maple cabinet and an oval-shaped speckled marble counter.

title: Vindicate's Combat Gear
description: A blue watered silk tapestry hangs on one of the varnished ebonwood walls, and a mosaic tiled ceiling rises overhead.  An open-mawed greater vruul statue sits in one corner of a speckled black marble floor.  There is a gilded maple cabinet on one side of the shop and an oval-shaped speckled marble counter on the other.

title: Genivie's Outfitting
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls, and a mistwood beam ceiling rises overhead.  A worn rug sits in one corner of the wooden floor.  There is a glass-topped mistwood counter on one side of the shop and a plain wooden table on the other.

title: Genivie's General Store
description: The broad sweep of the wooden floor is interrupted by a worn rug.  Halfway to the beam ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A gold-leafed mistwood cabinet and a plain wooden table are pushed close together in the back of the shop.

title: The Black Wolves' Den
description: An oak-framed slate hangs above a small ash-filled hearth.  Oak-paneled walls are lined with a pair of bookcases in black and white, rising to the vaulted and beamed ceiling.  An inviting well-worn bench sits on a painted silhouette of a wolf's head covering the smooth stone floor.

title: Stormwild's
description: A platinum-framed portrait hangs on one of the mural frescoed walls, and a crystal domed ceiling rises overhead.  A uniformed butler statue sits in one corner of a gleaming white marble floor.  There is an elegant mahogany counter on one side of the shop and a round glass case on the other.

title: Saesa's Weaponry
description: Beneath a skylight-set golden oak beam ceiling, a colorful silk healing herb chart hangs on one of the golden oak-paneled walls.  A series of golden oak shelves and a sunset red silk-covered table sit in opposite corners while a woven sunset red tasseled rug rests on a polished golden oak floor.

title: Simple Blessings
description: Ribbed black willow walls rise from a speckled black marble floor.  Just above a scarlet torch ginger-filled vase hangs a blue watered silk tapestry, and a vaulted ceiling completes the picture.  An oval-shaped speckled marble counter and a gold-leafed mistwood cabinet stand side by side in the middle of the room.

title: Koops' Armory
description: The broad sweep of the wooden floor is interrupted by a worn rug.  Halfway to the wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  An oval-shaped speckled marble counter and an ornate black marble vault carved with bas-relief battle scenes are pushed close together in the back of the shop.

title: Olliver's Armory
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  An engraved copper bin and a plain wooden table sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on an unfinished wooden floor.

title: Stormwild's Couture
description: Beneath a pastel cloud-painted ceiling, a tall platinum mirror hangs on one of the white moire silk-covered walls.  A lustrous claw-footed mahogany counter and a carved mahogany table sit in opposite corners while a circular collector's case rests on a gleaming white marble floor.

title: Stormwild's War Accoutrements
description: A curious silver-framed painting hangs on one of the smooth grey stone walls, and a pastel cloud-painted ceiling rises overhead.  A display stand encasing a dark compendium sits in one corner of a gleaming white marble floor.  There is a carved mahogany wardrobe on one side of the shop and a wrought iron rack on the other.

title: Silvergate, Performance Hall
description: Each of the comfortably cushioned seats has an excellent view of the large stage that is the focal point of this room.  Niches along the cream-colored walls are draped with rich gold damask curtains, and the red carpet laid over the oak parquet floor leads to a stage and its nearby podium.  The low ceilings allow even those seated in the back row to hear the performances.

title: Xarian's Extraordinary Emporium
description: Beneath a black-veined white marble dome painted with a mural of a star-blanketed night, a pair of crossed mithril claidhmores with deathstone pommels hangs on one of the mica-flecked black marble walls.  An elaborately carved leaf-shaped black marble table and a detailed ruby-trimmed mithril vault sit in opposite corners while a multi-tiered white marble fountain rests on a black and white checkered marble tile floor.

title: Ungerd's Weaponry
description: Beneath an ebonwood beam ceiling, a midnight blue rising phoenix tapestry hangs on one of the varnished ebonwood walls.  A jewel-inlaid caddy and a vine-carved mahogany table sit in opposite corners while a bronzed drake sculpture rests on a speckled black marble floor.

title: Drevenn's Magic Shoppe
description: Beneath a vaulted ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the polished oak walls.  A gilded maple cabinet and a glass-topped mistwood counter sit in opposite corners while an open-mawed greater vruul statue rests on a speckled black marble floor.

title: Balantine's Outfitting
description: A midnight blue rising phoenix tapestry hangs on one of the plain wooden walls, and an ebonwood beam ceiling rises overhead.  A worn rug sits in one corner of a polished oak floor.  There is an etched brass bin on one side of the shop and a plain wooden table on the other.

title: Hoover's Combat Gear
description: Beneath a billowing silk ceiling, a Four Winds Isle map hangs on one of the blue watered silk walls.  An aqua-hued seaglass display and a warped treasure chest sit in opposite corners while a pile of striped throw pillows rests on a colorful mosaic floor.

title: Cryheart's Weaponry
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A gilded maple cabinet and a plain wooden table sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on an unfinished wooden floor.

title: Cecelia's Combat Gear
description: Beneath a mistwood beam ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the celadon marble walls.  An oval-shaped speckled marble counter and a wicker basket sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on a speckled black marble floor.

title: The Non Prophet
description: Translucent pale blue glaes walls rise from a checkerboard lapis and glass floor.  Just above a blue-hulled modwir airship replica hangs a kelyn-framed animal court painting, and a steel-ribbed vaulted ceiling completes the picture.  A blue-streaked white marble counter and a glass-topped blued steel case stand side by side in the middle of the room.

title: Teegan's Weaponry
description: A ruby-eyed grinning skull hangs on one of the plain wooden walls, and a vaulted ceiling rises overhead.  A pile of striped throw pillows sits in one corner of a glossy mahogany floor.  There is a jewel-inlaid caddy on one side of the shop and a vine-carved mahogany table on the other.

title: Isola's Weaponry
description: A blue watered silk tapestry hangs on one of the plain wooden walls, and a vaulted ceiling rises overhead.  A brass flowerpot sits in one corner of an enameled hardwood floor.  There is an engraved copper bin on one side of the shop and a vine-carved mahogany table on the other.

title: Hoover's Magic Shoppe
description: The broad sweep of the wooden floor is interrupted by a worn rug.  Halfway to the wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A gold-leafed mistwood cabinet is pushed to the back of the shop.

title: Ardwen's Arcane Antiquities
description: Beneath a smoke-blackened wooden ceiling so grimy that the detailed mouldings are obscured, a gold-framed storm griffin painting hangs on one of the rough hewn oak walls.  A scarred mistwood bar covered with ages of stains from unknown liquids and a black lacquered liquor cabinet with blade-scarred doors sit in opposite corners while a mat of fresh rushes liberally sprinkled with sawdust rests on the worn modwir floor.

title: Cryheart's Weaponry
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, an ancient battered tower shield hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A gold-leafed mistwood cabinet and a iron-bound ebonwood chest sit in opposite corners while a hanging suit of full plate armor rests on an unfinished wooden floor.

title: Cecelia's Weaponry
description: Beneath a mistwood beam ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the celadon marble walls.  An oval-shaped speckled marble counter and a flexible willow woven basket sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on a speckled black marble floor.

title: Cecelia's Weaponry
description: Beneath a mistwood beam ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the celadon marble walls.  An oval-shaped speckled marble counter and a bamboo rack sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on a speckled black marble floor.

title: Teegan's Magic Shoppe
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls, and an uneven wooden ceiling rises overhead.  A worn rug sits in one corner of an unfinished wooden floor.  There is a gold-leafed mistwood cabinet on one side of the shop.

title: Isola's General Store
description: Beneath a glossy modwir plank ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the glossy mistwood walls.  A gilded maple table and an oval-shaped speckled marble counter sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on a polished oak floor.

title: Isola's Outfitting
description: The broad sweep of the wooden floor is interrupted by a handblown double-heart bottle.  Halfway to the vaulted ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the polished oak walls.  A gilded maple table and a gold-leafed mistwood cabinet are pushed close together in the back of the shop.

title: Ardwen's Dungeon
description: Beneath a verdigris lichen-covered grey granite ceiling, an array of blood-stained chains and shackles hangs on one of the blood-stained chiseled granite walls.  A deeply-grooved blackened marble altar and a deeply-stained chipped marble reliquary sit in opposite corners while a scattering of moldy straw and rags rests on the granite slab floor.

title: Myshel's Menagerie
description: Beneath a vaulted polished teak ceiling, an ivory inlaid gold-framed portrait hangs on one of the polished ebonwood-inlaid oak walls.  A burled maple-inlaid ebony bar and an elegant ebonwood armoire swept with crimson brushstrokes sit in opposite corners while a tightly woven oval red and gold wool rug rests on the black marble floor.

title: Karlyna's General Store
description: Beneath a mosaic tiled ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the polished oak walls.  An oval-shaped speckled marble counter and a plain wooden table sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on a polished oak floor.

title: Xanith's Outfitting
description: Beneath an ebonwood beam ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the varnished ebonwood walls.  A gold-leafed mistwood cabinet and a gilded maple table sit in opposite corners while a wooden statue of Rone Wehnimer rests on a polished oak floor.

title: Xanith's Outfitting
