description: Beneath a mosaic tiled ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the ribbed black willow walls.  A bamboo rack and a wicker basket sit in opposite corners while a pile of striped throw pillows rests on a speckled black marble floor.

title: Koops' Outfitting
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls, and an uneven wooden ceiling rises overhead.  A worn rug sits in one corner of an unfinished wooden floor.  There is an oval-shaped speckled marble counter on one side of the shop and a plain wooden table on the other.

title: Koops' Magic Shoppe
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls, and an uneven wooden ceiling rises overhead.  A worn rug sits in one corner of an unfinished wooden floor.  There is an oval-shaped speckled marble counter on one side of the shop and a plain wooden table on the other.

title: Saesa's General Store
description: Beneath a golden oak beam ceiling, a glass-fronted display case hangs on one of the tawny leather-covered walls.  A graceful golden oak rack and a series of golden oak shelves sit in opposite corners while a tawny lion skin rug rests on a polished golden oak floor.

title: Saesa's Weaponry
description: Beneath a golden oak beam ceiling, a delicately carved pearwood lapharp hangs on one of the golden watered silk walls.  A long golden oak counter and a series of golden oak shelves sit in opposite corners while a crimson rose-patterned carpet rests on a polished golden oak floor.

title: Simple Blessings, Peace
description: Enclosed by blue watered silk walls, the shop features an elegant tiered wedding cake in the center of its hardwood floor.  A simple floral tapestry hangs under the tiled ceiling.  Right near the front is a glass-topped mistwood counter and a gilded maple table.

title: Shallimar's Outfitting
description: A tattered spiderweb hangs on one of the mahogany paneled walls, and a vaulted ceiling rises overhead.  A pile of striped throw pillows sits in one corner of the black marble floor.  There is an oval-shaped speckled marble counter on one side of the shop and a staved-in treasure chest on the other.

title: Shallimar's Weaponry
description: Mahogany paneled walls rise from the black marble floor.  Just above a large anvil hangs a tattered merchant permit, and a vaulted ceiling completes the picture.  A bamboo rack and some hammered copper display hooks stand side by side in the middle of the room.

title: The Nursery
description: A tall wooden pillar carved with alphabet letters rises from a mosaic stone floor to a painted ceiling depicting the night sky.  A red wooden chest and a round banded oak table sit in opposite corners against pale blue painted walls.

title: Black Wolves' Weaponry
description: An archaic map of the Wolves' Den and some heavy forged iron hooks hang on the darkened stone walls.  A sturdy weapons rack reaches from the worn stone floor to the hewn oak ceiling.

title: Ye Olde Magic Shoppe
description: Beneath a black-veined white marble dome painted with a mural of a star-blanketed night, a pair of crossed serrated vultite claidhmores with ruby pommels hangs on one of the mica-flecked black marble walls.  An elaborately carved leaf-shaped black marble table and a detailed ruby-trimmed mithril vault sit in opposite corners while a pair of imposing black-veined white marble tigers rests on a black and white checkered marble tile floor.

title: Items of War
description: Beneath a black-veined white marble dome painted with a mural of a star-blanketed night, a pair of crossed rolaren claidhmores with deathstone pommels hangs on one of the mica-flecked black marble walls.  An elaborately carved leaf-shaped black marble table and a detailed ruby-trimmed mithril vault sit in opposite corners while a carved marble ranger colossus wielding a deathstone-pommeled mithril claidhmore rests on a black and white checkered marble tile floor.

title: Ungerd's Weaponry
description: Beneath an ebonwood beam ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the varnished ebonwood walls.  An oval-shaped speckled marble counter and a flexible willow woven basket sit in opposite corners while an open-mawed greater vruul statue rests on a speckled black marble floor.

title: Ungerd's Weaponry
description: Beneath an ebonwood beam ceiling, a ruby-eyed grinning skull hangs on one of the varnished ebonwood walls.  A jewel-inlaid caddy and a vine-carved mahogany table sit in opposite corners while a handblown double-heart bottle rests on a speckled black marble floor.

title: Balantine's Outfitting
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls, and an uneven wooden ceiling rises overhead.  A worn rug sits in one corner of an unfinished wooden floor.  There is a gilded maple cabinet on one side of the shop and a plain wooden table on the other.

title: Balantine's Outfitting
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls, and an uneven wooden ceiling rises overhead.  A worn rug sits in one corner of an unfinished wooden floor.  There is an engraved copper bin on one side of the shop and a plain wooden table on the other.

title: Henty's Depot, Warehouse
description: A massive ramp leads down from a large opening adjacent to some stairs.  Numerous papers have been affixed to a nearby bulletin board labeled, "Inventory."  A series of pulleys and ropes line the ceiling of the passage, in order to securely move cargo between floors.

title: Henty's Depot, Signage
description: A number of panels in the mahogany wainscoting have been scratched, most likely due to the movement of the trunks and chests that fill this corner of the shop.  Brass sconces illuminate the container's spacious interiors, several of which are lined with silk and others with velvet.

title: Henty's Depot, Containers
description: Sheer black silk drapes partition the various racks on display.  Polished rosewood glints beneath a brass sconce, while deep, rich ebony beside it.  A patchwork mantle hangs upon a silvergilt rod, as someone has apparently taken to storing their cloak on one of the racks.

title: Henty's Depot, Floor Displays
description: Tiers of shelves line the walls, supported by both mundane and peculiar brackets.  One particular clear glaes fixture has been roped off, keeping smudges and any unfortunate accidents from occuring.  That shelf has been filled with water and several colorful fish swim inside it.

title: Henty's Depot, Wall Displays
description: Stone, glass, and wooden slabs are displayed in towering wrought iron racks.  A listing of prices for the materials lays upon a rather plain counter in the shadow of the display.  In the corner, obscured by the racks are a pair of cherrywood armoires.

title: Warehouse, Platform
description: The solid oak platform sits in the middle of the warehouse floor, an island in the middle of a swirling sea of activity.  From here you have a wonderful view of all of the activity going on in the warehouse.

title: Warehouse, Storage Room
description: The storage room is surprisingly quiet, though compared to the warehouse itself it would almost have to be.  A long wooden counter stretches across the entire length of the room, restricting public access to the main storage area.  At the end of the counter is a low, wide platform that is used to facilitate the loading and unloading of leathers and furs.

title: Prison, Hallway
description: A foul smell, like an unclean bathhouse, fills the air.  It slams into passersby like a brick wall, unrelenting in its nasal assault.  A glass-encased lantern hangs from the ceiling, providing barely enough light to illuminate a heavy iron door and a bolted bronze door in this section of hallway.

title: Prison, Hallway
description: Loud squeaks and scurrying noises can be heard from behind a rusted metal door in the north wall.  A small set of stone steps to the south leads to a massive glaes door, at least fifteen spans of a human's hand tall and eight spans wide.  Twin wall sconces hold flickering torches near each door.

title: Prison, Hallway
description: The scent of sulphur lies heavy in the air, and a blazing torch brightly illuminates everything.  A thick mithril door stands opposite a battered bronze one, with the latter appearing as though it had recently been beat down.  A number of stone chips litter the back wall, whereupon a sconce is set.

title: Frith's Inn, Rooftop
description: You stumble across the debris-strewn rooftop.  A ledge skirting the building permits access to an open window in the wall rising to your left.  The tar feels tacky beneath your feet as you notice a broken skylight to your right.  A rope ladder is tied to one of the crossbars.

title: Beldrin's Game Hall, Storeroom
description: You are perched precariously atop a stack of casks.  You see the floor of the storeroom beneath you.  The ceiling is so close you can touch it and the open window is within your reach.

title: Beldrin's Game Hall, Larder
description: This is the larder where food and drink served in the gaming hall are stored.  An open window near the ceiling reveals a patch of sky, but it is too high for you to reach from where you now stand.  Casks of wine and ale are stacked almost to the rafters, leaving you little room to maneuver.  A stairway leads down.

title: Wehnimer's Museum, Rooftop
description: The view from the rooftop extends all the way to the walls of Wehnimer's Landing and beyond.  Exposed to the elements, this wind blown edifice juts up into the sky opposite the observatory tower on the eastern side of the museum.  Protected from errant footfalls by metal rims, various stained glass skylights are set into the rough stone floor.  An unobtrusive drainpipe is attached to the side of the building, leading rainwater away from the roof.

title: Temple, Chapel of Life
description: Far beneath the roots of the Temple, you stand in a place of judgment and change.  Two statues face each other across the chamber.  One, made of pale alabaster, gleams in the dim light.  The other, carved of diorite, soaks up all light and is barely visible.  A bell tolls somewhere unseen, deep and sonorous, as the heartbeat of its mother must sound to the babe yet unborn in the safety of the womb.  There is a sadness to the sound that instills in you an intense sense of loss and foreboding.

title: Paupers, Vault
description: You are standing in a secluded alcove toward the rear of the vault.  One of the lockers has been removed for you and rests open on a stone counter.

title: Paupers, Vault
description: This is a secluded alcove toward the rear of the vault.  One of the lockers has been removed for you and rests open on a stone counter.

title: Paupers, Vault
description: Light from several torches flickers over silver sconces fastened to the walls.  Legend has it that this heavily carpeted, soundproofed vault once successfully protected a king's ransom from an attempted siege by rampaging barbarians.  Few have attempted to breach the security of the members' steel-reinforced storage lockers in modern times, for tales of the consequences abound and are not for the faint of heart.

title: Paupers, Vault
description: Light from several torches flickers over silver sconces fastened to the walls.  Legend has it that this heavily carpeted, soundproofed vault once successfully protected a king's ransom from an attempted siege by rampaging barbarians.  Few have attempted to breach the security of the members' steel-reinforced storage lockers in modern times, for tales of the consequences abound and are not for the faint of heart.

title: Paupers, Hot Tub
description: Silky smooth, aromic cedar planks and benches form this intimate hot tub.  You feel yourself relaxing in the steamy air as the warmth of the water soothes your weary spirit.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Gnarled Trees
description: A narrow trail winds through a thicket of gnarled trees, leading further down the cliffside into an open area.  A few cabins and cottages nestle among the trees, which provide a bit of shelter from the stiff bay winds.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Ledges
description: The cliff drops off steeply, affording a view of the dark sand and rocky bayside below to the small houses perched along its edge.  The slope rises sharply to the south into a stand of gnarled trees along the clifftop.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Gnarled Trees
description: The trail winds downward through the trees, past an ancient, wind-twisted trunk that leans across the path.  The sound of the bay crashing against the rocks at the foot of the trail can be heard from below.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Ledges
description: A wide ledge runs along the curve of the cliffs, dotted by huge rocks and driftwood that has fallen from the slopes above over the years.  The blue water of the bay stretches into the distance, speckled with the colorful sails of passing ships.  A rocky trail winds down through the rocks to the bay.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Ledges
description: The ledge winds around a niche in the cliffs, the shacks set among the rocks somewhat sheltered from the constant wind by the curve of the land.  Weathered trees line the edge of the cliff above, their branches swept back over the merchant road.  A steep trail leads down the cliffside.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Ledges
description: Scattered trees and scrubby bushes have taken root on the wide ledge, their branches slanted inwards toward the cliffside by the pounding winds from the bay.  The blue waters of the bay extend off to the horizon, dotted by whitecaps and the sails of passing ships.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Ledges
description: The wide ledge ends in a steep cliff that drops off into a desolate vista of uninhabitable rocky shore stretching off to the west.  A path winds down to the shore to the north, and a set of narrow stone steps has been carved into the rock, providing a precarious ascent to an outcropping of rock above.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Rocky Slope
description: Windswept trees line the trail as it winds up the cliffside, sloping down to the east and rising in a steep path away from the bay.  The wind whistles through the branches, filling the air with a faint howling.  Small cabins and cottages have been built along the trail, tucked into sheltered niches in the stone.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Ledges
description: Ancient trees rooted in the cliffside shade the rocky ledge with windswept branches, home to the nests of fenvaoks and other cliffside creatures.  A grizzled weasel-like creature scurries among the roots, and something that looks like a bat flies swiftly by.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Rocky Slope
description: A trail winds up the cliffside, ending at a jumble of rocks that shields this drier patch of ground from the surf-pounded waterfront.  Hardy grasses grow in clumps along the foot of the cliff, and screeching fenvaoks call out from their nests in the rocks above.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Rocky Slope
description: A niche in the cliffs shelters a sloping field of scattered rocks and dry brush.  Grasses rustle in the constant wind sweeping in from the bay, and seabirds soar overhead, their plaintive cries echoing from the cliffs.  A steep trail winds up the cliffside between the rocks.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Fenvaok's Roost
description: An outcropping of huge, jagged boulders extends from the cliff, home to the nest of seemingly hundreds of screeching fenvaoks.  The stones are cluttered with ragged nests of weeds and branches, and the huge birds soar to and fro, bringing food to their young and viciously defending any attempt to approach their haven.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Overhang
description: This huge outcropping of stone hangs out over the precarious ledges below.  A few gnarled trees have found enough dirt to take root near the dark mouth of a cave set into the cliff, from which emanates a somewhat acrid odor and a faint sound of fluttering wings.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Cave
description: The rough, shadowy cave smells of musk and sea air.  Lining the stalactite-riddled ceiling are an uncountable number of bats, their small furred bodies crowded together for warmth and companionship.  Thousands of beady black eyes stare down at you, shining in the low light.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Waterfront
description: Surf pounds against the uneven, slippery rocks that border the bay, and sea-spray dampens the path.  Fenvaoks swoop low over the water, diving for meals, and roost in their nests on the cliffside that winds off to the west.  A rocky trail leads up the uneven slope to the ledges above.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Waterfront
description: The ancient hulk of a merchant schooner, shipwrecked many years ago, lies far offshore, tatters of its sails and ropes still fluttering in the wind from its broken mast.  A dozen seagulls perch on and around a pile of boulders, squalling at visitors as they pass.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Waterfront
description: The cliff rises steeply to the south above a wide swatch of dark sand.  Seaweed has been strewn among the rocks by an exceptionally high tide, and now lies drying in the sun as gulls search it for tidbits.  A row of cabins is nestled against the cliff, interspersed with a few gnarled trees.

title: Coastal Cliffs, Waterfront
description: The path ends at a jumble of rocks, fallen from the cliff ages ago and now covered by lichens and surrounded by scraggly beach grasses.  The bay surf pounds against the shoreline in a cloud of mist that does not quite reach the homes set back against the sheltered cliff.

title: Alabaster Spire, Library
description: The spacious room is crowned by a high, vaulted ceiling of lapis lazuli tiles traced with silver lines, its intricate patterns echoing those of the mosaic floor.  Towering bookcases and armaria line the walls, with champagne silk-covered divans positioned near each.  Four pillars, carved to resemble sturdy lor trees, stand guard over the large, rectangular table and velvet-padded chairs in the center of the room.

title: Tunnel
description: A constricted tunnel curves away into dark shadow.  Roots hang from the dirt ceiling and walls, mimicking the cob-webs secreted in various protected nooks and crannies.  The walls are very uneven, as though they were cut in haste.

title: Tunnel Dogleg
description: The passageway snakes through the ground, roots dangling from its walls like a beard.  Occasional squeaks sound from the shadows in the floor and walls, as small creatures protest the disturbance.  A glow lights the tunnel to the southwest, silhouetting the corridor's fringe of rootlets.

title: Pond Burrow, Square
description: A large cavern is cut into the hill, its floor and ceiling crafted of smooth rock with a pronounced pattern of striations.  Fanciful trees fashioned from the same gorgeous stone sit in monumental urns around the perimeter, each leaf carved in minute detail.  A generous round oak door on the cavern's west wall is surmounted by a sign reading simply 'Tavern', and the noise of revelry emerges from behind it.

title: Pond Burrow Tavern
description: The tavern is a generous room set with long tables and benches.  A few more private tables are nestled in the back, each one with its own tapestry curtain.  Candles burn merrily, giving the room a warm golden glow.  In the corner sits a small stage where a few instruments are leaned against tall stools.  You also see a long modwir sideboard with the tavern menu on it and the tavern door.

title: Pond Burrow, Pond Tavern Way
description: Tavern Way passes the front of Pond Burrow's mead hall.  Cheerful pools of light fall from its shuttered windows, glowing on the walk.  Its entrance can be seen a little further north.  As the paved walk rounds the southern corner of the building, it narrows into a gullet-like tunnel notable for the row of lanterns hung down its length, all carved in the shape of flying bees.  They appear to head purposefully down the corridor in search of nectar.

title: Pond Burrow, Honey Tunnel Turn
description: The tunnel angles toward the distant sound of revelry, music and laughter mingled in a fluctuating buzz.  Soft light from bee-shaped lanterns overhead falls on two round doors each set in a small alcove.  An attractive pattern of tiles paving the walk mimics octagonal sections of a hive.

title: Pond Burrow, Honey Tunnel Way
description: The tunnel narrows, as well as branching.  Occupying the space on the west is a carved panel, which divides the egresses to two other passageways.  An involved scene is carved upon it in bas-relief.  The lantern overhead hovers at the end of the chain that supports it, fashioned in the image of a large flying bee.

title: Pond Burrow, Mead Tunnel Walk
description: Mead Tunnel Walk is rendered aromatic with the smell of mead wafting from a brewery, which is obviously located somewhere nearby.  A few doors find a home in the walls, their owners undoubtedly fond of the drink.  Halflings who pass occasionally sniff the air with appreciation and nod, as if judging the quality of the air to be satisfactory.

title: Pond Burrow, Cookie Promenade
description: A breeze rounds the turn of the walk, carrying the aroma of baking pastries.  The Promenade is paved with an attractive pattern of tiles, its light and dark contrasts creating an octagonal motif.  Alternating mosaics depicting tarts, cookies and cupcakes alternate every few feet along the corridor's length.

title: Pond Burrow, Cookie Cul-de-sac
description: The cul-de-sac turns within a cobblestone circle, its walls a frieze of carved images.  One doorway occupies the circle, sitting proudly in the midst of the ornamentation.  The sill around it is likewise sculpted, its image that of a large cookie which surrounds the whole door.

title: Pond Burrow, Mead Tunnel Walk
description: The walk meanders along, its flagstones bathed in warm circles of light cast by lanterns hanging along the roof.  The aroma of brewing mead spices a comfortable breeze traveling the tunnel.  Doorways to either side of the passageway are painted in bright colors, interspersed with an attractive border of flowers carved into the stone between them.

title: Pond Burrow, Mead Tunnel Walk
description: The passageway turns, its lanterns changing shape as they march down tunnels in different directions.  Scrolled shells give way to lanterns crafted in the shape of large walnuts.  A stone plaque is attached to the wall between a couple of doors, helpfully offering directions.

title: Pond Burrow, Honey Tunnel Way
description: A branch in the tunnel is marked by a fountain mounted on the wall.  The water emerging from the tangle of carved bees seems to be moving slowly, until one realizes it is honey.  The corridor is home to a couple of doors, their lintels crowned with sculpted beehive boxes.

title: Pond Burrow, Honey Tunnel Way
description: The long corridor's length is marked by the pools of light cast by distinctive lanterns.  Halflings amble along passing through the successive spotlights, their voices animated and high-pitched.  A faint odor of brewing mead alternates with that of baking pastries, carried on a breeze which plays through the tunnels.

title: Pond Burrow, Rum Tunnel Turn
description: Rum Tunnel Turn is a quiet corner with brightly painted doors creating a patchwork of color around its bend.  In each direction along the promenade, stone benches are placed, their seats bare inches off the paving stones.

title: Pond Burrow, Rum Tunnel Lane
description: The corridor angles, its bend creating a corner where rests a short bench.  Halflings occasionally seize the opportunity to stop, sit and devour a pastry, before continuing along.

title: Pond Burrow, Tart Tunnel Walk
description: Tart Tunnel Walk boasts polished stone tiles set into its ceiling and walls.  Larger tiles pave the walk, each one decorated with an elegant design incised upon it.  The illumination is soft, shed from angular lanterns hung along the length of the corridor.

title: Pond Burrow, Tart Tunnel Way
description: The tunnel branches in several directions, its juncture marked by a circular stone set into the floor, its surface masterfully carved.  It depicts the heavens above-ground, constellations and moons rendered with tiny crystal chips inset into the rock.  Somewhere nearby, burning incense adds its exotic flavor to the air.

title: Pond Burrow, Tart Tunnel Way
description: Tart Tunnel Way is rendered true to its name by the mouth-watering aroma of baking pastries, which wafts from one or more of the round doors clustered at this bend in the corridor.  Small groups of halflings stroll around the curve, smiling as they catch a whiff of the delicacies browning in nearby ovens.  On one wall is a carved panel depicting a bas-relief still-life of berries, scones and tarts.

title: Pond Burrow, Tart Tunnel Branch
description: The tunnel branches, its divergence marked by a stone bench set between a group of round doors.  Carved stone flowers cluster around the legs of the settle, each petal perfectly rendered.  The lanterns overhead evolve from angularity to an ornate spiral, which marks the row of lamps marching along the ceiling to the southwest.

title: Pond Burrow, Rum Tunnel Lane
description: Rum Tunnel is decorated with the beginning of a mosaic which extends to the southwest, its surface a continuous panorama of color.  A great battlefield is depicted, with armies ranged across the hills in clashing splashes of color and motion.  The lamps above light the tableau, shedding illumination from spiraling profiles which mimic ocean shells.

title: Pond Burrow, Rum Tunnel Lane
description: The Lane widens into an octagonal alcove before angling toward the southwest.  The paving stones are beautifully laid within this circular area, in an interlocking pattern of octagons punctuated with a host of tiny mosaic bees.  In the center of the design sits a larger bee, the queen of the hive.

title: Pond Burrow, Tart Tunnel Walk
description: The corridor bends sharply, the annex where diverging tunnels meet adorned with a large bas-relief panel.  Round doors fill the remaining walls, their sills richly carved with stone filigree.  An urn sits beside one of the doors, inhabited by a delicate fern carved from granite.

title: Hummingbird Pond, Bridgeover
description: Cobblestones begin at the bridge's foot, escorting the avenue along its path, which winds between a dense cluster of immaculate cottages.  Grouting the stones, green moss grows, adding the contrast of its verdant color to the stones' grey palette.  At various points along the road sit carved statuary, depicting rabbits, toads and other small woodland creatures.

title: Hummingbird Pond, Bridgeover
description: The cobblestone avenue rings a courtyard, where large terra cotta urns hold small, decorative trees and cascades of flowering vines.  Tables and chairs are set beneath a trellis covered with grapevines.  Houses sit nestled in the garden setting, adding as much charm as the flowering ornamentation.

title: Hummingbird Pond, Bridgeover
description: Bridgeunder Lane follows the perimeter of the central courtyard, its outer shoulder adorned with a row of cottages.  A dense bank of hostas lines the walk, sending up tall stalks studded with lavender flowers.  Overhead, a single majestic magnolia tree adds the perfume of its blooms to the breeze.

title: Hummingbird Pond, Bridgeover
description: The lane dog-legs, edging the triangular courtyard.  Competing ovens within the cluster of homes lining the road send out aromas that would coax the most satiated mouth to water.  Groups of halflings stroll through the gardens, stopping to greet friends and admire the manicured grounds.

title: Beldrin's, Backroom
description: This small, bare room seems to have been no more than a storage closet in earlier days.  The addition of some faded wood paneling and a rickety desk and chair has converted it to a makeshift office.  A dusty, gold-framed portrait of a portly human in a ceremonial snowcat vest hangs askew above the desk, and a surprisingly heavy oaken door is set in one wall.

title: Rogue Guild, Entry Hall
description: A dimly lit hallway leads north into the shadows and east into a darkened chamber from which quiet sounds of whispered conversations and laughter drift in.  A black-clad giantman stands guarding the hallway, his deceptively friendly smile glinting in the torchlight as he looks you over.

title: Rogue Guild, Hallway
description: The hall is panelled with dark wood and hung with heavy tapestries that dull the sounds of footsteps.  Illuminated only by the glow from the torches to the south, the passage continues north into darkness.  A draft of cool air occasionally wafts in from a narrow stairway that leads up through an opening in one wall.

title: Rogue Guild, Upstairs Hallway
description: The narrow hall is dimly lit by torches set into brass sconces on the walls, and carpeted with a thick woven rug that muffles your footsteps.  Several portraits are set in rich wooden frames and mounted on the walls.  Their eyes seem to follow you as you move, in what is probably just a strange trick of the light.

title: Rogue Guild, Shop
description: The rich wood of the wall paneling glows in the light of a large chandelier.  A number of tables, racks and cabinets fill the room, displaying an impressive selection of wares.  An oak door opens in one wall.

title: Rogue Guild, Lounge
description: Thick tapestries and richly panelled screens divide this spacious room into a dimly lit maze of pathways and corners, providing a measure of privacy to the candlelit tables arranged artfully throughout the room.  A quiet murmur of muted conversations and clinking glasses flows through the room.

title: Rogue Guild, A Dark Niche
description: This shadowed corner, set in an oddly angled wall behind a tapestry, contains only two plain chairs and a small niche in the wall.  The stone walls are chilly, and the shadows are deep.

title: Rogue Guild, A Curtained Table
description: Thick brocade curtains shield this quiet table from the rest of the room, providing a measure of privacy and muffling much of the sound from outside.  A small oil lamp in the center of the table illuminates the richly-panelled wall and the shimmering thread of the curtains.

title: Rogue Guild, A Private Nook
description: Rich tapestry covers the screens that shut this quiet table off from the room, and a flickering candle provides barely enough light to make out the carved modwir table and chairs and the figures of anyone who might happen to be hiding in the shadows.

title: Rogue Guild, Hallway
description: A dark, windowless door is set into the stone wall at the end of the hall, bordered on both sides by heavy tapestries that keep the chill from the stone to a minimum.  A narrow hall leads off to the west, lit by the dim glow of a single torch at its end.

title: Rogue Guild, Courtyard
description: The courtyard before you is roughly square in shape, its borders a melange of textured stone and wooden walls made up of the back and side walls of the surrounding buildings.  The ground is paved with irregular slabs of dark stone interspersed here and there with patches of bare dirt or tufted grass, and a few weeds and bushes have taken root along the walls.  The courtyard is old but well-kept, and a patch of sunlight in the center nourishes a lone tree.

title: Rogue Guild, Hallway
description: A slight draft from the west stirs the tapestries that cover parts of the stone wall.  Faint torchlight from the west provides enough illumination to make out the geometric patterns on the well-worn carpeting that muffles any footsteps.

title: Rogue Guild, Hallway
description: A chill draft blows up from the narrow stairwell at the end of the hallway.  A lone torch set in a brass sconce near the stairs illuminates the bare stone of the walls, which are uncovered by insulating tapestries here.

title: Rogue Guild, Basement
description: The heavy wooden boards of the floor are worn smooth by centuries of passing feet and scored by the marks of thousands of objects being dragged in and out of storage over the years.  The rough, unadorned stone walls form an irregularly-shaped chamber that extends to the east and south, and a heavy trapdoor is set into the floor near the western wall.

title: Underground Tunnel
description: The low tunnel, barely high enough for a dwarf to stand in here, seems to open into more spacious passages to the east and northwest--though it is impossible to see very far in the darkness.  The faint glimmers of some light in the distance illuminate the passage just enough to see its direction.

title: Rogue Guild, Upstairs Hallway
description: Twin brass sconces hold dimly glowing torches on either side of an artfully carved dark felwood door set into the north wall.  A faint draft ruffles the heavy brocaded curtains that cover the end of the hall, sending a shiver of cool air along the passage.

title: Misty Isle Exteriors, Akaelos'
description: The curving marble walls of the expansive, circular chamber enclose a dozen immaculately-kept worktables at which an equal number of meticulously-groomed halfling and human draftsmen labor at their inks and papers.  A tall dark elf, his waist-length black hair intricately braided and his gem-clasped robes shifting in the light from the glaes skylight above, moves about the tables, whispering instructions to the draftsmen.

title: Misty Isle Exteriors, Nazgir's
description: The walls of this spacious workshop are set with panels of fine woods ranging from pale haon to richly toned ebonwoods, inset with a variety of patterns in jade and ivory to illustrate the skill of their craftsmen.  The elegantly clad dwarven artisan moves from table to table, a constant grumbling emanating from his squat, dark figure as he issues instructions to apprentices engaged in carving finely-made doors.

title: Misty Isle Exteriors, Estates
description: This luxurious office is panelled in fine cedar that fills the room with its woodsy scent.  Finely-carved tables are set here and there, bearing models of a variety of elegant rural manors and lodges.  A tall, red-haired woman in a forest-green riding habit, a hint of elven heritage evident in the curve of her ears and her haughty bearing, glances over a leather-bound registry as she nods instructions to the workmen who hurry in and out of the room by the rear entrance.

title: Misty Isle Exteriors, Alphel's
description: A warm scent of wood polish and herbal incense fills the cozy workroom, and the golden light of half a dozen hand-blown glass oil lamps illuminates the richly panelled walls.  Alphel, a stout, middle-aged human clad in finely made, but casual cotton tunic and leather trousers, mutters instructions to his clerks as he returns his attention to polishing a slab of fine golden haon.

title: Misty Isle Exteriors, Kelsene's
description: The whitewashed brick walls of the tidy office are arranged with numerous small paintings of a variety of modest buildings of wood and stone.  A smiling half-elven woman, her dark hair swept up in a neat snood, oversees the room from a spacious modwir desk, arranging neat stacks of parchments and sketches as she hums quietly to herself.  A narrow stairway leads down.

title: Misty Isle Exteriors, Dunner's
description: A small barred window near the ceiling illuminates the room with a smattering of light.  The stone walls of the basement are stacked with all manner of wood and metal panels, along with bins holding a fascinating variety of metal bits and hardware.  A middle-aged, bespectacled dwarf glances over the inventory, pushing his felt cap back on his head as he scratches his greying beard and rummages through the papers in his hand.

title: Misty Isle Exteriors, Cabins
description: This wood panel-lined office is small, but well-kept and cozy, and several leather-covered chairs invite customers to rest while waiting.  Dusty, but well-groomed young men hurry in and out of the office, taking whispered orders from the leather-clad sylvan woman who shuffles through paperwork at the counter, glancing up with her bright green eyes.

title: Misty Isle Exteriors, Tooma's
description: A brawny, bare-chested giantman, a massive tool belt strapped around his waist, works busily in a small area, sorting heavy planks of a variety of woods.  Various sheets of plans and orders have been tacked up on the rear wall of the backroom, where a wooden table supports a brass-banded ale barrel.

title: Misty Isle Exteriors, Osby's
description: The rough showroom is stacked to the eaves with scrap metal, scorched bits of wood, and other salvaged materials.  Scurrying noises in the shadows indicate that the scrawny, unkempt half-elf who oversees the operation may not be the only inhabitant of the room -- though he seems to be the only two-legged one.

title: Misty Isle Exteriors, Coggin's
description: The lean, oily-looking human standing behind the low counter glances up from polishing his locksmithing tools and pushes his dark, greasy hair back from his face as you enter.  Disorganized stacks of wood and metal doors rest against the walls, most with their hinges broken or skillfully dismantled.

title: Misty Isle Exteriors, Halki's
description: The large but ill-kept office is covered in mud and scattered straw, and stacks of wood, branches, and mud bricks are everywhere.  A makeshift counter stands near the center of the structure, where an apprentice wipes her hands on her voluminous aprons as she muddles through a stack of parchments.

title: Misty Isle Exteriors, Hekko's
description: The floor of the room is inches deep in mud, straw, wood, and bark chips, and dried leaves that have blown in through the paneless window.  A filthy, leathery-skinned dwarf, his dirty-blond hair twisted into a long rat-tail of a braid down his back, chips at a rough wood plank with a crude chisel, grumbling through his beard as he works.

title: Rogue Guild, Office Anteroom
description: This small room serves as a waiting area for those requesting a presence with the guildmaster.  A few chairs and a table sparsely furnish the otherwise cramped space.  One darkly clad elf sits slumped over asleep, oblivious to your presence.

title: Guildmaster's Office
description: The office is small, but well-appointed in contrast to the rough stone of the building outside.  Rich paneling in a variety of exotic woods covers the walls, hung with fine tapestries and paintings from all corners of Elanthia.  A large polished ebony desk, carved around its edges with elaborate symbols of the Arkati, dominates the room.

title: Rogue Guild, Courtyard
description: The second story of the building above overhangs the courtyard here, shading a small arrangement of tables set among the flagstones.  Torches set into the walls provide light for nighttime meetings, and a narrow passage leads into an alleyway between the buildings in the corner.

title: Rogue Guild, A Dark Alley
description: This narrow, dark alley winds between the stone rear wall of the gaming hall on one side and the heavy wooden structure of an old warehouse on the other.  Various piles of crates and boards are stacked throughout, forming a maze of dark niches and passageways, and the smattering of light that reaches the alley from far above is not enough to dispel the deep shadows.

title: Rogue Guild, Courtyard
description: Several sturdy wooden tables and benches stand against the rough stone wall here, their surfaces marked by years of weather, stains, and dagger holes.  The windows above are securely boarded, and a small alley leads into a dark space to the south.

title: Rogue Guild, Courtyard Center
description: An old monir tree stands alone here in the center of the courtyard, its huge roots ringed by a circular low stone wall that also serves as a bench.  The tree's highest branches reach above the three-story buildings that surround the courtyard, thriving on the sunlight and fresh air above the shadows.

title: Rogue Guild, Courtyard
description: An old fountain is set into the stone wall in the corner of the courtyard, trickles of cool water still running down its eroded stone face to fill the clear pool at its base.  The semicircle of stones that serve as a bench around the fountain and the well-worn flagstones that cover the ground around it give the impression that this was once a public thoroughfare.

title: Rogue Guild, Courtyard
description: The cracked flagstones to the north give way to a grassy area in the shadow of the warehouse wall.  Wooden benches stand against the side of the building, and a faint sound of dripping water can be heard from the north.

title: A Narrow Alleyway
description: This narrow cul-de-sac is dark even in daylight hours, concealed from the street beyond by a high wooden fence and shaded by a sheet of metal that protrudes from the warehouse above.  A stack of old crates is piled against the grey stone wall, and a few of them have been pulled aside to form an impromptu seating arrangement.

title: Rogue Guild, Courtyard
description: A rusted metal ladder is fastened to the stone wall of the building, leading to the roof above.  Several old crates are arranged in a circle on the stony ground as if they have been used for seating, and a few scraggly bushes have taken root in the soil next to the wall.

title: Rogue Guild, Rooftop
description: Smells of cooking and other less appetizing things waft up from the street below.  The deserted rooftop is swept clean but for a few wooden crates arranged near the stone rampart that overlooks the street.

title: Rogue Guild, Courtyard
description: Most of the weeds and stones have been cleared from the courtyard here, and the dirt surface is packed hard and scuffed with the evidence of many footsteps and physical struggles.  Wood panels rest against the walls, apparently to provide a small measure of padding over the rough stone.

title: Rogue Guild, Courtyard
description: Under the shadows of the overhanging branches of the tree and the high stone wall of the building to the north, a few cracked flagstones give way to a packed dirt surface that continues east.  Wooden boards and stacks of crates are lined up against the wall in a haphazard pattern.

title: Rogue Guild, Rooftop
description: The second-story rooftop is bounded by a low stone rampart, providing a view of the streets and buildings to the north.  Cries of hawkers and snatches of conversation echo up from below.  The stone wall of the building to the west is set with a cracked window, unadorned on this side but insulated from within by heavy curtains.

title: Rogue Guild, Meeting Room
description: From the looks of the low curtained stage at the south end of the room and the rows of brocaded seats, this room appears to have been part of an old theater that at one time must have included the bar and surrounding areas as well.  The wooden wall that separates the meeting area from the bar bears a large map of Wehnimer's Landing, and dark tapestries cover the walls to both sides of the stage, muffling any noise from outside.

title: Rogue Guild, A Dark Alley
description: A large tarpaulin stretched between the buildings overhead throws this section of the alley into even deeper shadow.  Stacks of boxes and junk line the walls, their contents and anything that may be hiding behind them hidden in blackness.

title: Rogue Guild, A Dark Alley
description: The buildings almost seem to lean together overhead in a trick of the light, throwing the alley into shadow as it narrows and ends in a featureless stone wall.  A plain wooden door is set into the wall of the warehouse to the west, and the alley continues south into the darkness.

title: Rogue Guild, Warehouse
description: The wooden walls of this small warehouse are lined with piles of barrels and crates, arranged carefully around the well-swept floor.  The merchandise looks fresh here, the containers formed of sturdy wood without signs of rot and labeled with the names of nearby ports of call.

title: Rogue Guild, Warehouse
description: Bright torchlight illuminates this end of the warehouse, where few goods are stored and space has been cleared to make room for several sturdy work tables.  The wooden walls are hung with diagrams of locks and traps, and the floor is strewn with a few rough carpets to reduce noise.

title: Rogue Guild, Rooftop
description: The north end of the rooftop ends in a low stone rampart looking down on a dimly lit alleyway.  A faint odor of smoke rising from the stone chimney that rests against the north rampart hints that the building may not be as deserted as its boarded windows and doors suggest.

title: Rogue Guild, Basement Workshop
description: Better lit than the rest of the basement, this corner seems to have been reserved for utilitarian purposes.  Rows of cluttered toolbenches line the far wall and small scraps of metal lay scattered about mixing with smaller shavings.

title: Rogue Guild, Basement Storage
description: A faint chill in the air seems to seep up from the uncovered stone floor in this narrow section of the basement.  Neatly-stacked piles of crates are arranged in some odd stacking configuration.

title: Underground Tunnel
description: The tunnel widens into a dark space littered with rocks and discarded bits of trash.  A trickle of water from some leak above runs down one dirt wall, glistening in the faint light and forming a puddle of mud at its base.

title: Underground Tunnel
description: The dirt tunnel narrows here, curving from the northwest to the east.  Ancient wooden rafters supporting the roof creak with every passing of a wagon overhead.

title: Underground Tunnel
description: The tunnel ends in a dark wall of ancient stone, the fundament of some centuries-old cellar.  A small wooden door set in a niche in the wall bears a roughly painted warning to "KEEP OUT!".

title: Locksmith, Cellar
description: Stacks of crates and boxes lay neatly piled in the corner of this dusty cellar.  You hear soft footsteps treading above you, as bits of dirt slip through the cracks of the ceiling.  A few muffled words are exchanged from upstairs and the familiar clink of silver can be detected changing hands.

title: Underground Tunnel
description: The packed dirt floor of the tunnel slopes down from the west to the southeast, clearing enough space for anyone but a giantman to stand upright.  The ceiling is reinforced with heavy wooden boards that provide a home for a variety of spiders and beetles.

title: Underground Tunnel
description: The tunnel dips slightly as it bends around the cold rock of a stone cellar, and the floor at the lowest point is muddy and tangled with roots.  A narrower and drier stretch of passage leads northwest into darkness, and a flicker of light can be seen from the southwest.

title: Underground Tunnel
description: The passage rises and narrows in the pitch darkness into a small, hollowed-out dead end.  Feeling around in the niche, you can make out the outlines of a small wooden trapdoor in the roof of the tunnel.

title: Underground Tunnel
description: A lone torch set into a rough sconce in the wall lights the intersection of several tunnels with its faint, yellowish glow.  The dirt floor is packed solid around a blackened area where someone might have built a fire once, and the walls are reinforced with piles of stone here and there.

title: Underground Tunnel
description: Thick spiderwebs cover the dirt walls and ceiling, the creatures moving within them only faintly visible in the dim light from the northeast.  A waft of cool air brings a damp, earthy smell from the southwest.

title: Underground Tunnel
description: The dirt walls are damp here, and the floor is a bit muddy.  Black beetles crawl in and out around the lattice of roots that protrude through the soil.  The tunnel narrows into a small dead-end passage to the south.

title: Underground Tunnel
description: The passage ends abruptly here in a ramshackle wall of old boards and planks.  The odor of mildew is almost overpowering, assaulting your nostrils like a wild animal.  A thin layer of slime covers most of the walls and floor, providing an ideal breeding space for all variety of worms and slugs.

title: Underground Tunnel
description: A solid wall of dirt-encrusted stone blocks the south end of the tunnel, diverting the passage into darkness to the east.  The roof is reinforced with heavy wooden boards from which cobwebs--and their arachnid inhabitants--dangle here and there.

title: Underground Tunnel
description: The tunnel here is reinforced with heavy wooden boards that seem to be crawling with all sorts of vermin.  A foul-smelling pile of blankets and rags in the corner and a lingering scent of something unwashed gives the impression that someone may have been using the niche as a hideout.

title: Wizard Guild, Scribe's Workroom
description: A thin layer of parchment dust coats the stained wooden planks of the floor.  Several scrolls and books have stacked up in the corner due to the haphazard organization of the shelves that line the walls.  A few high-backed leather chairs surround a large table in the center of the workroom.

title: Drogur's Guild Pins
description: Various etching tools line the walls of this small but well-kept stand.  In the very back, an obviously bored clerk stands behind a finely polished modwir counter.  Behind the counter, boxes and boxes of pins are stacked to the ceiling, and various bits of metal can be seen coating the ground.

title: A Small Leather Pavilion
description: Several battered wooden crates with the Warrior Guild insignia stencilled on them have been placed in this pavilion.  Warriors mill about examining wares, debating relative merits of weapons, and haggling with clerks over prices.

title: A Small Leather Pavilion, Back
description: More crates and boxes are stacked high back here. A few warriors sit or lean on the boxes, waiting patiently, sharpening weapons, polishing armor, or just talking amongst themselves.

title: Fat Thrak Table
description: The lamp on the wall behind you casts your shadow onto the rough wood surface of the table.  A bit of washcloth is stuck to a large splinter sticking straight out from the table's edge, promising a nasty cut should you accidentally lean into it.  The fading thrak on the surface of the table is so fat, the image can be seen on either side of your shadow.

title: Kittens and Thraks Table
description: Under the table, a rough wood box holds a mother cat and her three kittens safely out of the way of the patrons.  To accomodate the box, the chairs have been pushed a bit farther back from the table than usual.  Nearly invisible among the usual jumble of chicken bones and bread crusts on the floor is a bowl of milk.

title: Galloping Thrak Table
description: The wall behind the table is cluttered with memorabilia from past Pennant Chase events.  A high-backed chair resembling a throne has a variety of initials carved into it, with some of the initials viciously crossed out with deep, chiselling slashes.  A painting of thraks running diagonally across the table top catches your eye.

title: Cleric Guild, Landing
description: Walls made of polished and lacquered wood gleam a rich golden brown in the lantern light.  Whorls and swirls of darker grains weave through the whole, joining shadows and sun in an intricate dance.  In the center of the room stand two statues, one male and one female, backs turned but still looking over their shoulders, each watching the other.  They stand upon a wooden base with words carved into the surface.  The soft, rich scent of incense drifts through the air, tickling at the nose.

title: Cleric Guild, Courtyard
description: A small black marble building is set against the walls of the courtyard, its diminutive form shaded by a large willow tree overhead.  The willow's vines sway slowly every few moments, obscuring the dark walls of the building as stray winds pass by.  A pair of golden doors lead into the small structure, their surfaces engraved with a detailed rendition of keys.  The very air seems to muffle all sounds, imparting a strange pervasive silence to the area.

title: Cleric Guild, Shrine
description: A solid black marble altar sits to the south, nestled within a small arched alcove of ivory.  Many candles sit on the various ledges within the small space, their warm light casting the statue of a woman behind the altar in a soft, enveloping glow.  The woman stands firmly with an air of both grace and seriousness, though her downturned eyes give her a slightly somber look.  Delicate snowblossoms are strewn across the floor, their pale white hue reminiscent of winter's winds.

title: Blue Table
description: The table is covered with a soft blue cotton fabric embroidered with a swirling wave design which runs along the edge.  A pure white water lily gently floating in the half-full crystal bowl on the table is its only decoration.

title: Green Table
description: A green silk cloth embroidered along the border with intertwined hunter green vines and golden leaves is carefully draped over the table.  A simple crystal vase arranged with Imaera's lace and wildflowers is placed on it for decoration.

title: White Table
description: A sparkling crystal butterfly graces the table which is covered with a crisp pure white linen cloth.  The fabric is meticulously embroidered along the edges with dainty snowflake designs.  Several folded napkins trimmed with delicate lace are neatly placed on the table.

title: Black Table
description: An etched silver lamp illuminates this dark corner.  The soft satin fabric covering the table is delicately embroidered with silver runes and the surrounding chairs are upholstered with soft black velvet.

title: Skinny Thrak Table
description: The table edges here are sharply beveled, as though someone has been whittling away at them.  Etched into the table top are some of the most emaciated thraks you have ever seen.  Their sides draw in together at the waist, giving them a waspish look.

title: Helden Hall, Fishing Pond
description: The path twists and turns, opening into a small clearing of lush vegetation and clusters of wildflowers interspersed between blades of grass.  From the moss blanketed trunk of an oak, tendril-like branches overhang a clear, deep pool of water, bordered with verdure and flat stones.  An untidy stack of wood rests adjacent to charred earth upon which a fire pit nestles.

title: Empath Guild, Master's Hall
description: Polished walls of honey and black oak inlaid in a pattern of interlocking chevrons define the hallway of the annex that leads to the cauldron practice rooms.  Water flows slowly over a sheet of glass overlaying the woodwork in the corner, with occasional ripples betraying the presence of etchings in the glass.

title: Empath Guild, Cauldrons
description: Several training rooms completely equipped with cauldrons, beakers, measures, and other supplies, are accessible around the perimeter of this room, their arched entryways carefully positioned so that no room looks directly into the entrance of another.  A bundle of dried herbs is hung above each archway.  Rippling in each entryway, the air wavers and dances, as if thicker in the archways than elsewhere.

title: Empath Guild, Cauldron
description: An enormous cast iron cauldron with thick, hinged ring handles dominates the training room.  Sturdy metal hanging arms attached to a trammel are positioned above the fire pit, ready to adjust the height of the cauldron.  Rough wooden stirring paddles, spyders, pokers, and hooks are neatly arranged along the wall, within easy reach.

title: Inside Oak Tree
description: Deep in the hollow of this ancient tree, a few carved wooden stools are clustered around a fine-grained oak slab that serves as a table.  Soft light streams in through a large knothole, softly illuminating the area.  Sequestered from the hustle and bustle of the town square, this quiet chamber offers a cozy haven for weary caregivers.

title: Graceful Goldenrod Table
description: Brass lanterns with amber panes of glass cast a soft, golden light across the table.  Stalks of goldenrod are handcut into the glass, casting thin, wavering shadows.

title: Knotted Kerria Table
description: A rather twisted miniature kerria leans to one side in its terra cotta pot.  The slender green stems of the kerria have been trained to grow around one another forming loose knots.

title: Nocuous Nightshade Table
description: The table is dimly lit by candles hidden behind paper lantern covers.  Nightshade flowers are pressed into the thick paper shades, casting hazy shadows across the tabletop.

title: Artiminus' Combat Gear
description: A snarling troll king mask hangs on one of the knotty pine walls, and a raised fel panel ceiling rises overhead.  A pile of striped throw pillows sits in one corner of a polished oak floor.  There is a jewel-inlaid caddy on one side of the shop and a gilded maple table on the other.

title: Raging Thrak Inn, Rooftop
description: Dwarven loggers tirelessly haul crates of lumber along the cobblestone road below, moving along the street between the bathhouse and local bank.  The ancient oak tree of Town Square stretches up to the southeast.

title: South Crossing, Riverbank
description: The breeze stirs intermittently, bringing with it the smell of roasted acorns from the kitchen of a nearby home.  Not far to the south, the grasslands begin to give way to a thick forest.

title: South Crossing, Wooded Path
description: Wispy mosses dangle from the trees, clinging to their branches like cobwebs.  Some of them hang quite low, causing the people walking this path to navigate around them.

title: South Crossing, Grassland
description: Sparse trees spring from the plains.  They grow more densely to the south, forming the boundary of Trollfang forest.  The path continues on in that direction, quickly disappearing into the woodland darkness.

title: South Crossing, Forest
description: Birds of various species flit through the trees, weaving amongst them with agile grace.  Every so often, one will alight on a branch or rooftop for a moment before fluttering off.  They chirp and caw ceaselessly, filling the forest with their chatter.

title: Melgorehn's Crossing, Grassland
description: The landscape is in transition.  Not far to the south, the fertile plains quickly surrender the riverbottom to a dense forest.  It seems to have mattered not to the villagers, however.  The rows of buildings proceed on in both directions without interruption.

title: South Crossing, Forest
description: A small ridge rises against the edge of the path.  Its rocky surface provides a foothold for the multi-colored lichens and moss that grow upon it.  Amplified by the forest, the sound of rushing water can be heard from somewhere nearby.

title: South Crossing, Forest
description: The path moves away from the river to the west, wandering haphazardly through the trees.  Darkness permeates the forest, for little illumination is able to filter through the leafy canopy.  Only the areas cleared for homes recieve any light.

title: South Crossing, Riverbank
description: The river swells as it strikes a massive boulder in midstream, forming eddies along each bank.  A deep pool is created as a result of the conflicting flows cutting into the streambed.  Despite the depth, the gravel and mosses at the bottom of the pool are clearly visible.  Nourished over the centuries by the river it grows next to, a gnarled old oak towers above.  Dangling from one of its limbs is a knotted rope.

title: Crossing, In the River
description: The swirling waters of the river have created a deep swimming hole here, lined on the banks with small wildflowers and carpeted with waving green water plants.  Fish swim about your legs, darting away at the slightest move towards them.  The water is briskly chilly, giving you prickly goosebumps all over.

title: Melgorehn's Crossing, Grassland
description: To the southwest, the towering spire of Melgorehn's Reach looms above the plain.  Its peak is cloaked with clouds, hiding it -- and its secrets -- from view.  Pedestrians pause in their wanderings to gaze up at the famous landmark from which this village draws its name.

title: Melgorehn's Crossing, Grassland
description: The plain rises and falls, gently rolling in a series of broad knolls that stretch off into the distance.  Visible beyond the outskirts of the village, large herds of roltons graze upon the grass.

title: Melgorehn's Crossing, Grassland
description: The wind blows by, howling, and its touch sends waves rippling across the grass.  To the east, a line of trees follows the Locksmehr River as it slices through the plain.

title: South Crossing, Grassland
description: The grass is worn thin by the villagers' traffic, leaving a wide patch of dirt at the center of the homes here.  A dog tethered to a fence post barks at all who pass, its exuberant enthusiasm indicating it is more interested in being friends than protecting its domain.

title: Melgorehn's Crossing, Riverbank
description: People of varying races stroll along the path, enjoying the quaint charm of this hamlet.  They walk alone or in groups, occasionally stopping to speak to a passerby.  The river picks up not far to the south, its surface breaking into a rolling boil as it enters a long riffle.

title: Cleric Guild, Shop
description: Black iron candelabras are set below dark mahogany shelves, the candleflames sputtering softly.  A large crystal-paned counter is set against the western wall, its interior lined with velvet to cushion the beautiful wares inside.  Small chests are aligned in neat rows upon the floor, their gilted edges warping any light into strange patterns.

title: Cleric Guild, Library
description: Bookcases, stacked to overflowing with tomes and scrolls and other readables, fill this large room.  The air smells of the pleasant must only present in libraries, but no dust collects on the carefully maintained shelves.  Protected lanterns hang at regular intervals from the ceiling, shedding plenty of light to read by.  A carved wooden sign hangs just before the door.

title: Cleric Guild, Meditation Room
description: Candles cover every available space on the tiered walls, filling the room with golden light.  Tiny bits of silver hang from the high ceiling, glimmering like stars around a large golden ball.  Craters and seas have been beaten into the sphere, creating a replica of the moon Liabo.  Soft pillows made for kneeling sit in the center of the floor, making this a perfect place for reflection.

title: Cleric Guild, Prayer Room
description: Delicate arched niches have been carved out of the walls.  In each sits a small, beautiful statue of one of the Lords and Ladies of Liabo, looking out over those who have come to pray.  A number of kneeling pillows and padded benches have been placed strategically around the room, and a censer of soft incense hangs from the ceiling.

title: Cleric Guild, Halls of Lessons
description: The warm golden lacquered wood of the walls fades away into a dull, muted grey in this small chamber.  Orbs of the same drab color are set into runic patterns upon the floor, their crystalline surfaces glinting softly in the flickering light.  A statue of a man to the northwest stares quietly into the distance, as if gazing at something only he could see.  Set before the statue is a dark stone altar, its edges delicately carved and embellished, adding a tiny hint of beauty to the somber surroundings.

title: Cleric Guild, Training Foyer
description: Intricate marquetry of naturally hued woods, incorporating palest pine, purple-grey haon, vivid red cedar, and dusky ebonwood, forms the walls of this grandly proportioned foyer.  Assorted training rooms and their attendant equipment can be glimpsed further inside the training annex.  The dry, herbal scents of cedar and sandalwood fill the air, the aroma more intense near the lamps set along each wall.

title: Cleric Guild, Meditation Room
description: Tapestries hang over the wood paneled walls.  They depict a number of scenes, from a brilliant star in the sky to the rocky slopes of Thanatoph to a gently rolling sea.  Oil lamps burn in the corners of the room, providing soft light and a soothing scent.  Several multicolored pillows have been placed in the center of the room.

title: Cleric Guild, Prayer Room
description: Thin woven runners with long, thin scenes on them hang between rows of niches carved into the walls.  Small, beautifully carved statues sit in each nook, depicting each demigod represented in the pantheon of Others.  Tasseled kneeling pillows dot the floor, and long benches make a comfortable place to sit and pray.

title: Cleric Guild, Hall of Lessons
description: Dark ebonwood panels line the walls of this small room, their mottled surfaces dimly illuminated by several large pillar candles.  The statue of a man bedecked in black chain-mail is located within a small arched alcove, the white marble around him a stark contrast to the dark surroundings.  The man's face is stony even for a statue, and a grimly determined expression has been chiseled upon his face.  A simple black altar sits before the shallow niche, an ivory kite shield lying upon its surface.

title: Cleric Guild, Meditation Room
description: A single candle burns fitfully in the corner of the room furthest from the door.  The light it sheds is hardly adequate to brighten the room past an eerie glow, leaving the bulk of the area in creeping shadows.  A small sphere hangs from the ceiling, seeming as ominous and foreboding as the moon it represents.  Four black velvet pillows sit in the center of the room.

title: Cleric Guild, Meditation Room
description: Sanded, unpolished wooden planks cover the walls.  The room seems neither hot nor cold, bright nor dark, simply an extension of existence.  Grey cotton pillows have been piled in the center of the room, provided for kneeling and contemplation.

title: Cleric Guild, Prayer Room
description: The room, curved back upon itself like a short oval, is nearly claustrophobic.  Into each curved wall has been carved several niches.  From these perches look the Lords and Ladies of Lornon, peering down on all those who have come to pray.  The room is devoid of pillow or bench, leaving nothing but the floor to sit or kneel on.

title: Cleric Guild, Hall of Lessons
description: The high walls of this room are completely covered with the carved renditions of many rows of bookspines, making the surroundings resemble the shelves of some vast library.  Situated in one corner is a life-sized statue of a man sitting upon a high-backed chair, looking as if the thousands of stone books were but a paltry collection to him.  A grey altar sits before the man, looking very out of place amidst the scholarly surroundings.

title: Cleric Guild, Prayer Room
description: The golden wood paneling is broken only by two arched niches carved into the wall.  In each sits a masterfully carved statue of a woman, one touched by insanity and the other with beautiful feathered wings.  Grey pillows rest on the floor, and padded benches line the quiet room.

title: Cleric Guild, Master's Hall
description: Polished walls of honey and black oak inlaid in a pattern of interlocking chevrons define the hallway of the annex that leads to the cauldron practice rooms.  Water flows slowly over a sheet of glass overlaying the woodwork in the corner, with occasional ripples betraying the presence of etchings in the glass.

title: Annex, Hallway
description: Inlaid into the ruddy mahogany flooring of this broad corridor, bands of dark, medium, and light wood form paths to three exits set with stone of corresponding colors.  On the north side of the hallway, interlocking squares of white ash lead to a marble arch, and a strip of smokey-grey haon leads to a granite arch on the south side.  A line of dark ebonwood separates the two, terminating before the onyx-inlaid arch at the hall's west end.

title: Annex, Antechamber of Lornon
description: Dedicated to the Arkati of the Pantheon of Lornon, the atmosphere of this room is dark in all aspects.  Myriad black candles drip blood-red wax as they burn, filling the room with more heat and smoke than actual illumination.  A round ebony table inlaid with nine golden seals sits between two doorways.  As occasional drafts stir the heavy air, their resultant ripples create the illusion of macabre faces and writhing figures that quickly dissolve back into the veil of haze.

title: Annex, Antechamber of Others
description: Statues, figurines, and other sculptures fill this room, each representing one of the unaligned or lesser deities of Elanith.  Though not gaudy, the sheer variety of colorful hues in the decor lends the area a quiet exuberance which refuses to be classified as either dark or light.  The sense of presence here is not as commanding as that of the Lornon and Liabo antechambers, yet one can easily perceive an underlying, sometimes chaotic, energy in the air.

title: Annex, Antechamber of Liabo
description: From the whitewashed walls and alabaster tile floors, to the wide skylights and vast array of ivory beeswax candles, everything about this room is light.  Gossamer silk panels undulate gently as they ride the shifting currents of air that pass through two narrow, slit windows, the breeze slowing just enough to allow candle flames to flicker without being extinguished.  Bracketed by two wide doorways, a pale yellow pine table occupies a place of prominence.

title: Annex, Alchemical Storage
description: Brimming with bottles, canisters, jars, and containers of all sizes, rows of thick shelving nearly obscure the pale white paneling on every wall of this small cubicle.  A rectangular worktable occupies the center of the room, making maneuvering difficult.  Assorted mortar and pestle sets, clean and ready for use, are scattered amidst miscellaneous glassware and other equipment atop the table.

title: Annex, Equipment Room
description: Considering the amount of cleaning equipment stored here, one might expect a great deal of dust and disarray, yet not a single item seems out of place.  A stout open-front locker holds brooms, dust pans, and other janitorial tools, each hung or stacked neatly within.  Along each wall of the spacious room, equally sturdy lockers and cupboards store cauldrons, alembics, and large pieces of equipment.  Each item is carefully nestled in its own clearly labeled partition.

title: Annex, Dogma Workshop
description: Looking more like an altar than a surface for practice of the alchemical research, the top of the workbench is carved from a block of solid white marble and stands on an elevated platform in the center of this triangular room.  Crystal prisms, set into the walls near the room's apex, splinter daylight into its constituent colors while channeling it into a faceted orb that glows brightly above the workbench.  Staggered shelving on each wall holds assorted items of interest.

title: Annex, Ritual Workshop
description: Looking more like an altar than a surface for practice of the alchemical research, the top of the workbench is carved from a block of solid white marble and stands on an elevated platform in the center of this triangular room.  Crystal prisms, set into the walls near the room's apex, splinter daylight into its constituent colors while channeling it into a faceted orb that glows brightly above the workbench.  Staggered shelving on each wall holds assorted items of interest.

title: Annex, Meditation Workshop
description: Looking more like an altar than a surface for practice of the alchemical research, the top of the workbench is carved from a block of solid gray granite and stands on an elevated platform in the center of this triangular room.  Crystal prisms, set into the walls near the room's apex, splinter daylight into its constituent colors while channeling it into a faceted orb that glows brightly above the workbench.  Staggered shelving on each wall holds assorted items of interest.

title: Annex, Mission Workshop
description: Looking more like an altar than a surface for practice of the alchemical research, the top of the workbench is carved from a block of solid gray granite and stands on an elevated platform in the center of this triangular room.  Crystal prisms, set into the walls near the room's apex, splinter daylight into its constituent colors while channeling it into a faceted orb that glows brightly above the workbench.  Staggered shelving on each wall holds assorted items of interest.

title: Annex, Faith Workshop
description: Looking more like an altar than a surface for practice of alchemical research, the top of the workbench is carved from a block of solid black marble and stands on an elevated platform in the center of this triangular room.  Crystal prisms, set into the walls near the room's apex, splinter daylight into its constituent colors while channeling it into a faceted orb that glows brightly above the workbench.  Staggered shelving on each wall holds assorted items of interest.

title: Annex, Prayer Workshop
description: Looking more like an altar than a surface for practice of the alchemical research, the top of the workbench is carved from a block of solid black marble and stands on an elevated platform in the center of this triangular room.  Crystal prisms, set into the walls near the room's apex, splinter daylight into its constituent colors while channeling it into a faceted orb that glows brightly above the workbench.  Staggered shelving on each wall holds assorted items of interest.

title: Wyrwood Retreat, Approach
description: A neat, white gravel path lined with rowan trees leads from the wrought iron gate to a circular walk around a large space with a solitary wyrwood tree growing in the center.  A neatly lettered sign has been placed just outside of the tree's reach.  On the far side of the walk is a peak-roofed golden oak lodge.  Unlit oil lamps atop sturdy poles are placed around the compound, and a row of targets waits along the eastern end of the southern wall.  Chips and scorch marks on the brick wall give testimony to frequent practice sessions.

metadata.source: Wyrwood Retreat, outside the frontier town of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Wyrwood Retreat, Entryway
description: This open, airy room has smooth, polished floorboards that chirp whenever weight is placed upon them.  Bramble-carved ironwood benches rest beneath the windows in the northern wall, framing the doorway that leads to the meditation garden at the center of the lodge.  Wrought iron sconces supporting unlit oil lamps are set into the walls around the room.  A row of coat hooks is set to one side of a pair of sturdy ironwood doors leading back out to the front porch.

metadata.source: Wyrwood Retreat, outside the frontier town of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Wyrwood Retreat, Inner Garden
description: Open to the sky, the peaceful garden at the center of the lodge is filled with carefully pruned miniature glowbark trees and neatly trimmed grass.  Beds of crimson sirenflowers that rustle with every movement frame the doorways leading to various rooms.  Unlit glaes lanterns atop sturdy poles are set along the white gravel paths that lead to a thick meditation mat beside a rough boulder in the center.  A spring bubbles up from a rocky knoll in the northeast corner, flowing down to fill a small pool.

metadata.source: Wyrwood Retreat, outside the frontier town of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Wyrwood Retreat, Kitchen
description: Pots and pans, cooking utensils, and bundles of herbs hang from racks to either side of a black iron stove and a large double sink on the south wall.  Oak cabinets line the west wall.  A sturdy worktable takes up the center of the tiled floor, and a wrought iron chandelier with unlit oil lamps hangs above it.  Barrels of bulk food supplies are lined up beneath the windows framing the doorway in the east wall.  To the north are two bramble-carved ironwood benches placed on either side of a matching table.

metadata.source: Wyrwood Retreat, outside the frontier town of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Wyrwood Retreat, Practice Room
description: This open, airy room has a smooth, polished floor that is covered by thick mats at the north end.  A large oak storage chest and a bramble-carved ironwood bench rest beneath the windows in the western wall, framing the doorway.  Wrought iron sconces supporting unlit oil lamps are set into the walls around the room.  Matching suits of armor are displayed on the east wall, and an ironwood rack holding a bow, a sword, and a shield hangs on the south wall.  Practice dummies stand in a row at the south end of the room.

metadata.source: Wyrwood Retreat, outside the frontier town of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Wyrwood Retreat, Barracks
description: This open, airy room has a carved ironwood bed placed in the southeast corner of the smooth, polished floor.  A sturdy chest rests at its foot, and a wide shelf hangs on the south wall above the headboard.  Three identical beds are placed in a row on the other side of a doorway framed by two windows, each with a chest and shelf.  Wrought iron sconces supporting unlit oil lamps are set into the walls, and the north side of the room has a clear path to the dart board hanging on the east wall.

metadata.source: Wyrwood Retreat, outside the frontier town of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Cleric Guild, Training Annex
description: Twin sconces are set opposite one another on the north and south walls here, their dim flames casting long shadows down the hallway in both directions.  The floor is composed of carefully chiseled granite blocks, each one set against the next at a slight angle, and the walls are polished marble blocks from floor to ceiling.

title: Cleric Guild, Cauldrons
description: Several training rooms completely equipped with cauldrons, beakers, measures, and other supplies, are accessible around the perimeter of this room, their arched entryways carefully positioned so that no room looks directly into the entrance of another.  A bundle of dried herbs is hung above each archway.  Rippling in each entryway, the air wavers and dances, as if thicker in the archways than elsewhere.

title: Cleric Guild, Cauldron
description: An enormous cast iron cauldron with thick, hinged ring handles dominates the training room.  Sturdy metal hanging arms attached to a trammel are positioned above the fire pit, ready to adjust the height of the cauldron.  Rough wooden stirring paddles, spyders, pokers, and hooks are neatly arranged along the wall, within easy reach.

title: Silverwood Manor, Monk Room
description: Slats of polished bamboo form the floor of this spacious retreat, while the walls are lined with tubes of the plant cast together with thin strips of hemp.  An energy chime sits off to the side while several soft cushions are scattered about a hammered copper brazier in the center of the room.  Several large bonsai trees are placed about a carved stone fountain that gives off a soothing trickle as the water tumbles down the rocky falls.

title: Twilight Hall, Auditorium
description: Twin twilight blue carpets cascade down the aisles among the tri-sectioned rows of cushioned, mahogany benches.  Suspended above, a glass ceiling reflects and refracts the starlight, sending it scattering to every corner of the room.
