description: Dark and menacing, the suffocating density of the forest has seized all natural light, save a small breach in the underbrush to the southwest.  An occasional caw ruptures the ominous silence as avian shadows fly overhead, trapped beneath the towering crowns.

title: Wyrdeep Forest
description: Tufts of grey fur hang on a nearby branch, and an iridescent wing shimmers on the forest floor beneath a sliver of light.  Loud snaps echo around the path and resemble random pebbles thrown in distraction attempts.  Whispers in a unfamiliar tongue are heard, but have no discernable origin.

title: Wyrdeep Forest
description: A formidable cluster of yew trees shares the confined space with thorn-covered bushes and blocks farther travel into the forest.  An oppressive mist has formed along the ground and swirls hauntingly at the base of the trees.

title: Wyrdeep Forest
description: From light deficiency or curse backlash, the deformed trees resemble freaks of nature with their buckled trunks and twisted limbs.  Shifting shadows play tricks with the darkness, but the absence of noise prevents tracking.

title: Wyrdeep Forest
description: A great horned owl swoops down in an aggressive ambush, catching its victims off guard, but returns to the dark sky and an unseen haven.  The darkness is foreboding and inhospitable, and with every step, distorted faces appear in the bark of the trees.

title: Moot Hall, Council Chamber
description: A rich merlot carpet stretches from end to end of this large, spacious chamber, which is aglow from the moonlight shining in through several arched windows along an entire wall.  Large, verdant green plants rest in terra cotta vases in each corner of the room, and the walls are decorated with detailed paintings of nearby historical landmarks.  A circular table sits in the center of the room, surrounded by several wooden chairs.

title: Silvergate, Chaddeaux's Lair
description: The room is dimly lit by a chandelier fashioned from frayed rope nooses and carved ivory skulls, the hollow eyes glowing from candles hidden within.  Blood red walls stretch from the night black ceiling to the lush black carpet.  A small four poster bed, draped with silver satin curtains, occupies one corner.  A round table sits next to the bed, holding a decanter of dwarven whiskey.  One wall is dominated by a black marble fireplace.

title: Moot Hall, Pukk's Office
description: The pale grey walls of the office appear almost white when bathed in the moonlight that streams in through a large window overlooking the street below.  Two weapon racks stretch out above a heavy oak desk which fills the space before a huge, red bearskin rug.  A plush, large-backed couch is situated between a slate-topped bar and a wide, fur-lined dog bed.

title: Consortium, Lobby
description: The entrance of the Darkstone Bay Consortium is grand, with an expansive lobby that stretches far and wide.  There is plentiful wall space in which rows of cushioned chairs rest, providing a comfortable option for those waiting to conduct business.  Huge arched windows and a rustic wrought iron chandelier bathe the area with an ample amount of light.  A thick deep blue carpet runs from a pair of iron-bound doors and ends near a high dark elm desk where a lithe blonde-haired elf sits.

title: Consortium, Atrium
description: The area opens into a large spherical chamber, which is topped with a high dome glass ceiling.  Dark oak trees stretch up from the center of the atrium, their thick branches piercing through the sunlight gleaming down from above.  Rows of verdant green hedges run a border beneath walls of high glass windows, and a pair of mahogany doors sits between two greystone fountains.

title: Consortium, Exchange Hall
description: Dark wooden posts support the high ceiling of the exchange hall, which houses several wooden tables and chairs, many arranged in circles to offer plenty of space to allow conversations and trade to occur.  Heavy brocade curtains are pulled back along each wall to provide just enough light to seep in through a collection of large glass windows.  The wooden floor has lost its polish and is now marred by countless scuff marks from boots.

title: Consortium, Envoy Post
description: Ornamental monir pillars line the room on each side, framing a spacious carved stone table surrounded by wrought iron chairs.  Partitioned from the main meeting space, nooks of opulent ivory leather booths face an immense pane of glass that looks out on the exchange hall below.  Tall ferns and potted greenery loom over blue cushioned couches, their foliage providing a secluded place to relax.  Positioned against a statement wall of brushed muted copper is a tessellated mistwood credenza.

title: Consortium, West Hall
description: Dark-paneled walls encompass the length of this hallway, with its floor a stretch of burnished grey wood.  Modwir-framed portraits are staggered along one wall, each one depicting the face of several founders.  A polished statue of a red marble lion is perched at the side of a wide staircase leading up.

title: Consortium, Founder's Hall
description: Wide-paneled windows provide an expansive view of West Ring Road and the palisade walls of Wehnimer's Landing, with the trees of the Dragonsclaw forest rising in the distance.  Plush deep blue carpet runs the length of the floor and ends before a small step that leads to a tall modwir door.

title: Consortium, Lounge
description: A tall modwir door is nestled between two wide bookcases, which house hundreds of tomes.  Opposite of it rests a half-circle of plush sofas, each one centered around a low gnarled oak table.  The sweet aroma of vanilla emits from several candles behind a polished slate-topped bar.

title: Consortium, Garden
description: Cherry blossom trees provide a canopy of airy pink blooms over stone benches that line the pebbled paths intertwining around vibrant wildflowers.  Keeping guard over the garden, a patinated bronze fountain, boasting two carved lions, pours off into a water lily covered pond below it.  Multi-hued flora dot the landscape, adding pops of color to the lush grass and shrubbery.  In a quiet corner, an ivy-wrapped mistwood pergola suspends glass jars at varied lengths that house assorted flowers.

title: Consortium, Trophy Room
description: Scissor trusses made of dark monir run parallel along the ceiling, creating a vaulted roof to this vast room.   An annular chandelier composed of various antlers dangles from the center of the space and competes for the focal point of the area against a cobblestone fireplace.  Trophies of hunts from the past decorate the paneled blue walls, their lifeless expressions still holding their ferocity.  A petrified tree stump sideboard runs along the back of cognac leather couches that occupy the floor.

title: Consortium, East Hall
description: Dark-paneled walls rise up along a smooth floor of burnished grey wood.  Light from the atrium shines in through a row of high arched windows, which cast a warm glow along several fel-framed paintings along one wall.  A polished statue of a red marble lion stands to the side of a wide staircase leading up.

title: Consortium, Silver Gallery
description: Plush deep blue carpet runs along the floor of the hallway, and several potted plants rest along the width.  Ornate silver sconces are set into the dark-paneled walls, their light mixed with the sunlight from wide window and brightening the area.  An oversized painting of Darkstone Bay hangs near a wide mahogany archway, from which the sound of revelry and clanking glasses echoes.

title: Consortium, Baystone Parlor
description: A circular bar counter dominates the center of the parlor, its slate-topped surface polished to a high sheen.  Racks of wine bottles and empty glasses hangs above it, and a purple-haired elven barmaid offers an almost genuine half-smile to nearby patrons as she converses with them.  Several miniature pewter lions are positioned along a dark blue baystone mantle that stretches over a blackened stone fireplace.  Round tables and chairs provide seating throughout the edges of the room.

title: Consortium, Firefly Lounge
description: Deeply cushioned cobalt-hued couches draped with lush snowcat pelts flank a tidy desk topped with petrified modwir.  A baystone-punctuated chandelier candelabra hangs directly above the workspace.  Densely planted vegetation in a variety of colorful pots draw attention toward a trio of arched windows set into the darkly paneled walls.  Several colorful cloaks hang on hooks beside the entry.

title: Consortium, Souvenir Shop
description: Outcurved around the room, emblazoned cobalt mistwood counters gilded in copper are topped by cream slate.  Monir walls decorated with cutout trestles contain shelves and cubbies nearly overflowing with a myriad of trinkets and knickknacks.  Glass display cases and wooden racks line the opposite walls against arched floor-to-ceiling windows. Spanning the counter space, a dark-hued vaalin ladder sits on a track, allowing access to harder-to-reach goods.

title: Consortium, Chance Room
description: Lacquered paneled walls encapsulate the room where heavy brocade curtains hang to the sides of several bay windows, which look out towards the western gate of town.  Curls of smoke drift lazily near some green felt-topped tables, where several visiting patrons are raucously engaged in games of dice and tiles.

title: Consortium, Office
description: Heavy brocade curtains partially cover a row of thick glass windows that overlook the atrium down below.  A curved maoral desk and chair sit in one corner, bordered by two oversized rune-etched armoires.  A plush red bear skin rug dominates the center of the floor and stretches beneath a massive lion's head mounted on the wall.

title: Consortium, Assembly Hall
description: The walls of the assembly hall are paneled with dark wood, and several thick blue rugs are spread about the sturdy wooden floor.  A stage rises up against the far wall, where several armchairs and a high podium stand.  The center of the chamber houses rows of cushioned chairs, and behind them hangs a crisp banner with the crest of a red lion before a crossed hammer and pick on a field of silver.

title: Consortium, Black Hand Trading
description: Arabesque-patterned copper tiles sweep across the ceiling complementing the sumptuous mazarine rug covering the floor.  Dominating the eastern wall is a colorful etched-glass map that sits opposite a series of bay windows.  Hushed whispers echo across the open floor plan as various business negotiations take place at modwir desks and plush chairs clustered together.  A cobalt velvet couch wraps around a corner, enclosed by a free-standing latticework iron bar.

title: Xorus' Weaponry
description: Varnished ebonwood walls rise from a speckled black marble floor.  Just above an open-mawed greater vruul statue hangs a portrait of Darkstone Castle, and a vaulted ceiling completes the picture.  A iron-bound ebonwood chest and a gold-veined black marble counter stand side by side in the middle of the room.

title: Xorus' Weaponry
description: An old elven war banner hangs on one of the ribbed black willow walls, and a vaulted ceiling rises overhead.  An oily black kraken statue sits in one corner of a speckled black marble floor.  There is an elegantly carved oak armoire on one side of the shop and a twisted dark metal rack on the other.

title: Xorus' Magic Shoppe
description: Beneath an ebonwood beam ceiling, a framed lighthouse painting hangs on one of the ribbed black willow walls.  A carved mahogany box and an intricately carved ebonwood stand sit in opposite corners while a sphere-topped black marble fountain rests on a speckled black marble floor.

title: Dantevian's General Store
description: Beneath an ebonwood beam ceiling, a ruby-eyed grinning skull hangs on one of the varnished ebonwood walls.  A gilded maple table and a gold-leafed mistwood cabinet sit in opposite corners while a pile of striped throw pillows rests on a speckled black marble floor.

title: Dantevian's Magic Shoppe
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  An engraved copper bin and a bamboo rack sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on an unfinished wooden floor.

title: Dantevian's Magic Shoppe
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  An engraved copper bin and a flexible willow woven basket sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on an unfinished wooden floor.

title: Arkati Aided, Sheru's Strike
description: Enclosed by glossy mistwood walls, the shop features a bronzed drake sculpture in the center of its plank floor.  A midnight blue rising phoenix tapestry hangs under the beam ceiling.  Right near the front is a glass-topped mistwood counter and a gold-leafed mistwood cabinet.

title: Arkati Aided, Oleani's Orbs
description: A huge fanciful mural of two entwined figures hangs on one of the pink-tinged creamy silk walls, and a soaring sunrise-painted ceiling rises overhead.  A magnificent Oleani statue cradling gemstone orbs sits in one corner of a lustrous ivory marble floor.  There is a stepped gold hexagonal display on one side of the shop and a candle-lit draped shrine on the other.

title: Arkati Aided, Lorminstra's Love
description: An Arkati pantheon painting hangs on one of the varnished ebonwood walls, and a vaulted ceiling rises overhead.  A tiered alabaster fountain sits in one corner of an enameled hardwood floor.  There is a gold-veined black marble counter on one side of the shop and a silk-lined display case on the other.

title: Dara's Outfitting
description: The broad sweep of the strewn pine floor is interrupted by a braided seagrass rug.  Halfway to the beam ceiling, a portrait of Darkstone Castle hangs on one of the knotty pine walls.  A gilded maple cabinet and an oval-shaped speckled marble counter are pushed close together in the back of the shop.

title: Dara's Combat Gear
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls, and an uneven wooden ceiling rises overhead.  A worn rug sits in one corner of an unfinished wooden floor.  There is a gold-leafed mistwood cabinet on one side of the shop and a gilded maple table on the other.

title: Dara's Magic Shoppe
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls, and an uneven wooden ceiling rises overhead.  A worn rug sits in one corner of an unfinished wooden floor.  There is a vine-carved mahogany table on one side of the shop and a gold-leafed mistwood cabinet on the other.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: Stumps pepper the spacious clearing, as stacked logs leave evidence of their recent removal.  A grove of trees surrounds the area, leaving a natural palisade to add some security to the campsite.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: A line of silk pavilions casts a colorful array of numerous Imperial flags representing the different territories of the Empire.  Craftsmen work diligently outside their shops, the aroma of hops, meat, and freshly cut lumber consuming this division.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: Rugged canvas tents stand near the opening of the glade, as uniformed soldiers guard the entrance.  Knights wearing various Imperial crests heavily patrol the area, their clanging armor echoing throughout the Lower Dragonsclaw.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: A messenger holding a letter pauses a moment as they contemplate which direction to head before sprinting off down a worn path heading into the centralized camp.  Two soldiers rest near stacks of iron-banded barrels, helms tucked beneath their arms and flagons clenched in their hands, as they banter and laugh.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: A few children sit still, in a half-circle, before an elderly man who is perched upon a wide modwir stump, waving his hands about as he weaves a long tale to the enraptured audience.  Dappled moonlight leaks through the canopy of trees, illuminating the forest floor in a radiant glow.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: A roaring bonfire demands attention from the center of this temporary town, its coppery gold flames mesmerizing as they dance.  Rows of tents bordering the fire create purposeful pathways to other areas of the camp.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: Open wagons display weapons, clothing, and various goods for sale, allowing browsers to easily peruse the merchandise.  Shopkeepers tend to their wares and busy themselves creating a bustling atmosphere in this makeshift town.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: A thicket near the living quarters secures countless ropes as freshly laundered clothing hangs from them.  The bright scent of lemon soap lingers, but intermixes with smoke from the nearby fires.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: Burlap dummies on wooden stakes hang in an open field as soldiers fearlessly charge at them.  Shouts and hollers mimic the sounds of war as they reverberate throughout the meadow.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: A corral wraps around a clearing enclosing horses within its walls.  Stable hands escort the animals in and out of their pen, as the smell of hay is present on the breeze.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: At the end of the valley, trees creating an orchard take on a different hue and appearance.  Apples and pears ripe for the taking hang from their branches, providing an additional food source for the area.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: A squire rests next to a cooking fire, a sword half his size resting awkwardly against a log as he roasts a small squirrel in the nearby flames.  Wisps of charcoal-hued smoke curl and rise upwards, sending the alluring aroma of cooked meat and burning coals into the air.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: The sound of a woodpecker echoes throughout the forest and competes against the rhythmic noise of an axe against a tree.  Several giantmen, sweat darkening their tabards, grunt as they haul sharpened logs from the center of the field to pile near a series of wooden towers at the edge of the forest.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: Two elderly women huddle over a row of basins, taking turns as they dip clothes into the water, gossiping amongst themselves as they drag the garb against rugged washing boards.  A group of children engaged in a wooden sword fight frolic through the area, causing the women to pause and look on, before they run off.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: Numerous fire pits sit unattended outside faded canvas tents, their embers still faintly glowing despite the lack of flames.  The glimmer of metal flickers beyond the edge of the forest, accompanied by the clanking of armor as several Imperial soldiers continue their patrols.

title: The Boo-Wery
description: The narrow wagon has been decorated with tall curtains of green-on-ebon tartan, the excess fabric neatly folded upon the wood-planked floor below.  A lacquered mahogany tray encircled by sprigs of holly sits at the center of the room, displayed upon an overturned barrel branded with the name "Fryzel".  A display of carefully stacked ceramic steins flanks either side of the barrel, each unique drinking vessel painted with a variety of landscapes.

title: Baker's Shop, Sitting Room
description: Generously padded chairs surround small glass-topped tables covered in silk tablecloths, and ceramic tiles continue along the walls from the front room, adding a complementary decor to the area.  A dimly-lit corner offers a more secluded gathering spot, away from the constant flurry of bakery visitors.

title: Baker's Shop, Corner
description: Elaborately illustrated depictions of historical events hang on a freshly painted wall, low enough to be viewed while seated at one of the padded chairs around the small table.  A pie-shaped candle flickers lazily, casting dancing shadows across the floor and infusing a sweet apple pie fragrance into the air.

title: Baker's Shop, Tea Room
description: A long table surrounded by upholstered stools separates two sides of this tea room, with one side serving as a place to visit and drink, and the other side specially designed to brew teas and coffee.  Situated adjacent to a sideboard is a small stove with a cast iron kettle placed on the top, and a pitcher of fresh water has been conveniently positioned on the sideboard next to a variety of condiments.

title: Darkstone Bay
description: The jagged spires of the coastal cliffs rise up overhead as the Darkstone Bay floods in to eternally brush across the Black Sands beach. Nearby rocks glisten with the spray from the ocean, and the crashing of waves resounds nearby.

title: Darkstone Bay
description: The waters of Darkstone Bay are cold, made worse by the winds pushing against you.  The rocky walls of the coastal cliffs rise up to the west, as the murky waters continue endlessly to the north, connecting to the horizon.

title: Darkstone Bay
description: The waters of Darkstone Bay are cold, made worse by the winds pushing against you.  The rocky walls of the coastal cliffs rise up to the west, as the murky waters continue endlessly to the north, connecting to the horizon.

title: Darkstone Bay
description: A cold wind races across the surface of the bay, sending moisture and salt swirling about.  Beneath the waters, a large bed of kelp can be seen.

title: Darkstone Bay
description: The waters of Darkstone Bay are cold, made worse by the winds pushing against you.  The rocky walls of the coastal cliffs rise up to the west, as the murky waters continue endlessly to the north, connecting to the horizon.

title: Darkstone Bay
description: The waters of Darkstone Bay are cold, made worse by the winds pushing against you.  The rocky walls of the coastal cliffs rise up to the west, as the murky waters continue endlessly to the north, connecting to the horizon.

title: Darkstone Bay
description: A cold wind races across the surface of the bay, sending moisture and salt swirling about.  Beneath the waters, a large bed of kelp can be seen.

title: Darkstone Bay
description: The ocean swells rise up high, crashing down in loud splashes of water and foam.  Small bits of kelp float along the surface of the dark waters.

title: Darkstone Bay
description: The ocean swells rise up high, crashing down in loud splashes of water and foam.  Small bits of kelp float along the surface of the dark waters.

title: Darkstone Bay
description: A cold wind races across the surface of the bay, sending moisture and salt swirling about.  Beneath the waters, a large bed of kelp can be seen.

title: Darkstone Bay
description: A cold wind races across the surface of the bay, sending moisture and salt swirling about.  Beneath the waters, a large bed of kelp can be seen.

title: Darkstone Bay
description: In every direction the murky blue waters of Darkstone Bay spread out all around you.  Small waves rise and fall, sending ripples of foam and bits of kelp floating along the surface.  The silver glow of the moon cascades down, causing patches of the sea to almost gleam like metal.

title: Darkstone Bay
description: The ocean swells rise up high, crashing down in loud splashes of water and foam.  Small bits of kelp float along the surface of the dark waters.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: Smoke coils up from some nearby fire pits as dozens of settlers converge upon a boiling stew pot bordered by several logs.  Each passerby helps themselves to the ladle, filling their tin bowl before heading off elsewhere into the camp.  Stretching wide in a field across the way is a huge dusty brown canvas pavilion.

title: Sablo's Pavilion
description: Dark brown walls of canvas are pulled taut along several wooden posts, providing a wide center floor for the command pavilion.  A large cot occupies one corner, a heavy ermine blanket tossed haphazardly upon it.  Dominating the middle of the tent is a huge modwir table littered with dozens of maps, carved wooden miniatures, empty scroll tubes, and a shrunken skull paperweight.

title: Imperial Campsite
description: The area of the grounds here has been freshly cleared of trees, with rows of modwir trunks forming makeshift seating that surrounds a pristine white marble altar.   Aromatic incense oil burns within some faceted glaes-paneled lamps nearby, infusing the area with a mix of lavender and cedar.

title: Landing Bazaar, Lawn
description: The center of the bazaar opens into a wide grassy range, free of clutter and booths, the lush verdant meadow warmed by the moonlight above.  Townspeople gather nearby, some quiet and others boisterous as they travel between nearby shops and booths.  A cobblestone boulevard stretches to the north, bordered by several other roads and merchant structures.  Three large ironwood trees ascend at the edge of the yard, blanketing half of the area in darkness.

title: Landing Bazaar, Boulevard
description: A broad circle of russet cobblestones creates a wide courtyard, the space decorated with clusters of iron-wrought benches and tall leafy green trees.  Numerous roads lead off in every direction, each one eventually reconnecting to encircle the graveled expanse.  The brazen voices of hawkers reverberate from all corners, carried in from merchant booths and shops in the distance.

title: Landing Bazaar, Modwir Lane
description: The bustling atmosphere of the market intermixes with the relaxing sound of water bubbling from a lion-carved stone fountain.  Vendors push carts up and down the cobblestone road, stopping occasionally to demonstrate their goods or to make a sale.  The intoxicating aroma of coffee permeates the area, originating from the direction of one of the establishments.

title: Landing Bazaar, Baystone Byway
description: A slender wooden post rises amidst some flowerbeds, hoisting a banner depicting an emblem of a red lion, its cloth crisp and wrinkle free.  Multi-colored canopies decorate the edges of the road, each boutique boasting different goods to sell.  Inside each tent, merchants peddle their wares, a mixture of boisterous exchanges echoing throughout the street.  The mixed aroma of smoked meats drifts out from the open window of a nearby brick-lined shop.

title: Landing Bazaar, Baystone Byway
description: Barrels of spices bearing brightly hued pigments line the outside of a bay window belonging to one of the shops.  Along the pathway, crates of fresh produce and exotic flora are displayed to lure shoppers further inside.  Children play nearby, the feeble clacking of their wooden swords muffled by the clanking metal of two red-armored guards patrolling the area.  A small dusty kitten mews at the base of a tall oak tree, its bright eyes falling upon a tiny nest tucked among its branches.

title: Landing Bazaar, Modwir Lane
description: A thicket of modwir trees surges along one edge of the road, creating a blanket of darkness to envelope the exteriors of a handful of shops.  Children run playfully along the store fronts, peeking into each colorful window display before moving on to the next one.  A muted tune hangs in the distance, originating from an elven minstrel perched upon the edge of a wrought-iron bench, politely thanking shoppers that toss coins into a jar at his feet.

title: Landing Bazaar, Walkar Avenue
description: Merchants busy themselves outside their pavilions, drawing large crowds to observe them work on their crafts.  Textiles of vibrant prismatic colors hang from a few posts of the outdoor shops, the fabrics eerily waving in the winds.  The constant clang of a hammer on metal reverberates from behind a large thatch-roofed building, a plume of dark smoke billowing upwards.  Several thin hounds dart about the street, scratching at barrels and pressing noses to the ground, fast on the trail of their next meal.

title: Landing Bazaar, Walkar Avenue
description: Each side of the lane is fringed with several sturdy shops, their smooth slate roofs capturing some of the glint from the moonlight above.  A pennant stitched with the image of a waraxe flaps about, tethered to a long wooden post that stretches above a carved sandstone statue.  A cluster of wrought-iron chairs and tables litter the outside, allowing customers a place to rest and watch the crowds.

title: The Rhimar Rink, Entrance
description: Modwir walls enclose the well-sized shop, their surfaces colored with a whorled pattern of deep and light blues.  Small child-sized handprints of white paint are scattered along the walls, each one containing a scribbled name, and shaped to resemble a falling snowflake.  A large window opens near the entrance, where a burly giantman greets visitors.  A crowd of onlookers stand on the outside of a half-walled arena, watching as several people skate along a stretch of ice.

title: The Quick Prick
description: Several glass display cases are staggered into three rows, each one spaced apart strategically to allow a wide berth for customers to pursue the gleaming inventory within.  Heavy black brocade curtains are pulled back from a large front window, making way for an abundance of moonlight to brighten the entire shop.  Wispy tendrils of flowery scented smoke drift across the vermillion-hued walls, as patrons move about after being greeted by a smiling curly-haired shopkeeper.

title: Blended Brew, Front Room
description: Aisles of tall, cognac mistwood shelves are stocked with a plethora of jars holding a colorful array of herbs, each labeled with the tea blend it contains.  Cutout trestles with shelves of ivory ash sit behind a sales counter, exhibiting tea kettles, cups, and saucers, the items varying in material and brightly painted colors.  Across from the carved white ash door, a moss and flora mural hangs from the back wall of the shop, its plant life lending an earthy smell to the floorspace.

title: Blended Brew, Sitting Room
description: Cushioned loveseats and decorative chairs in a color spectrum of green hues litter the open, airy floor plan.  Hand-painted silk walls depict abstract herbs and flowers cascading from ceiling to floor in a repetitive pattern.  Beams of moonlight stream through an arched window, the gossamer curtains lightly moving with the slightest hint of air as patrons walk by.  A white ash sideboard curves around an antique pewter stove topped with a gilt-foiled white ceramic kettle.

title: The Blue Orchid
description: Glass-paned lanterns hang from wooden beams along the ceiling casting a glow throughout the area.  The walls are decorated with several framed paintings of blue orchids, and a low counter is cluttered with an abundance of ink bottles and an assortment of needles.  Silk onyx curtains border a wide window, the display showcasing multi-hued stock tattoo drawings.  In the back, a muscular tattoo artist leans over a writing desk, an inked-hand diligently sketching a design on a piece of vellum.

title: Relocated Reverence
description: The walls of this simple shop are decorated with talismans and symbols of worship displayed on rows of small iron hooks.  Joined modwir counters block access to the walls, leaving just enough space behind them for a solemn green-robed pilgrim to wander between and attend to patrons who wish to make a purchase.  Hanging from the ceiling, a flickering lantern dangles from a rather ordinary iron chain.

title: Patty's Cakes
description: The small, white-walled shop holds the sweet mixed aroma of cinnamon, flour, and honey.  A trio of aproned halfling maids move hurriedly about the room, restocking the shelves between taking orders.  Several patrons shuffle about the store, perusing the variety of frosted pastries and other delicacies a freckle-nosed halfling baker sets upon a counter.

title: The Rhimar Rink, Ice Arena
description: A smooth landscape of hard ice stretches across the entire length of the circular arena.  Half-walls border the rink, providing both protection and a view for onlookers.  A crisp chill hovers in the air.

title: Blended Brew, Smoke Lounge
description: A cloud of clove-scented haze lingers over the top of corbeau leather armchairs that are clustered in dimly lit corners.  Wrapping around the lounge, an ornately carved modwir bar topped in a gilded viridian marble is attended to by a sharply dressed bartender.  Rows of velvet-padded stools line the counter, offering a view of the ledge housing bottles of liquid ranging from amber to honey-hued.  Backlit shelves angle downward to display cigar boxes and their contents behind walls of thin glass.

title: Obsidian Tower, Museum
description: The roughly hewn obsidian walls and floor are a stark contrast to the polished finish of the rest of the tower.  Ornate sconces, lit from within by tall beeswax candles, adorn the walls at even intervals, their orange and red light flickering and dancing across the walls beneath the shadowed ceiling.  Two gnarled ebonwood trees flank a blackened display case and a crude shelf formed from rock jutting from the wall, while a pair of mannequins stand at attention on either side of the room.

title: Marshal's Office
description: This small, tidy room is sparsely furnished, with only a large desk in one corner, lit by a wall sconce and covered with various papers, letters, and maps.  A small footlocker sits in the corner of the room, and the walls are adorned with displays of different arms.  In the corner, a stand displays a gleaming suit of field plate armor.

title: Obsidian Tower, Meeting Hall
description: Several rows of oak casks line one side of this room, stacked from floor to ceiling.  Running down the other side of the space is a lacquered ebonwood bar at the perfect height for a dwarf.  At the far end of the room, a large fire pit is tended by a stout Khanshael pitmaster who is diligently attending to multiple spits of aromatic meat roasting over dancing flames.  A wide and well used table spans the length of the room's center, affording various Khanshael the chance to share tales, food, and drink.

title: Obsidian Tower, Elder's Chamber
description: The center of this room is filled by a large slab of intricately carved stone that serves as a desk.  Smooth rolaren and invar runes have been meticulously inlaid upon its surface detailing the history of past campaigns.  Behind the desk, three towering ebonwood chairs rest on a slightly elevated base, commanding the chamber.  The wall behind the desk presents a striking display of weapons and armors that have been carefully maintained in battle-ready condition.

title: Obsidian Tower, Marroc's Lair
description: A low arch opens into a spacious cave hewn from the obsidian foundation of the tower above.  Gauzy, sanguine bolts of silk are draped from the cave's high ceiling, lending a ruddy hue to the dim light.  Mounted on the wall opposite the entry is a large scaled hide, secured in position by small mithril spikes.  Along another wall is a raised obsidian dais above which is a small niche.  A thick pile of furs of various sorts overlays the platform, and a plush snow cat fur rug covers a portion of the floor.

title: Council, Misty Void
description: You are totally surrounded by dense mist.  All directions are the same, yet all directions hold different possibilities.

title: Moot Hall, Storage Hall
description: You are in a darkly lit hallway which travels east-west.  To the east you can see an intersection leading to more lockers, and a curtained opening on the north wall.

title: The Circle Stone
description: Crafted from thick lengths of heavy black leather, the tent's edges sway slightly.  A varnished wooden desk is set near the back, with evenly stacked sheets of vellum organized neatly upon it.  A rune-etched circular stone table dominates the center of the pavilion, bordered by several wooden stools.  Wisps of yellow, green, and cyan smoke curl up from crystal beakers that continuously bubble within a rhimar-lined rack.

title: Beyond the Glass
description: A massive domed chamber of thick, crystalline shards stretches outward, while several etched arcane sigils form a pattern across the glass-like floor.  A huge obsidian obelisk floats, suspended in mid-air, its surface crawling with wisps of glowing energy.  Ribbons of ethereal light swim along the chamber, lazily coiling and twisting about.

title: Encampment, Prime Tower
description: The top of the imperial watchtower is spacious and ringed by a reinforced wooden railing that provides an ample view of both the camp and the Lower Dragonsclaw forest beyond.  A small weapons rack houses several spears, bows and arrows, and a wide cabinet safely secures some preserved rations and herb kits.

title: Encampment, Weaver Tower
description: The top of the imperial watchtower is spacious and ringed by a reinforced wooden railing that provides an ample view of both the camp and the Lower Dragonsclaw forest beyond.  A small weapons rack houses several spears, bows and arrows, and a wide cabinet safely secures some preserved rations and herb kits.

title: Encampment, Drake Tower
description: The top of the imperial watchtower is spacious and ringed by a reinforced wooden railing that provides an ample view of both the camp and the Lower Dragonsclaw forest beyond.  A small weapons rack houses several spears, bows and arrows, and a wide cabinet safely secures some preserved rations and herb kits.

title: Encampment, Griffin Tower
description: The top of the imperial watchtower is spacious and ringed by a reinforced wooden railing that provides an ample view of both the camp and the Lower Dragonsclaw forest beyond.  A small weapons rack houses several spears, bows and arrows, and a wide cabinet safely secures some preserved rations and herb kits.

title: Encampment, Pylon Tower
description: The top of the imperial watchtower is spacious and ringed by a reinforced wooden railing that provides an ample view of both the camp and the Lower Dragonsclaw forest beyond.  A small weapons rack houses several spears, bows and arrows, and a wide cabinet safely secures some preserved rations and herb kits.

title: Singing Traveler Table
description: Half-full wooden ale tankards lie scattered over the table.  The soft melody of a mandolin, reminiscent of Kai's triumph song, can be heard in the distance.

title: Elemental Fire Table
description: The table is formed from cooled lava which has been polished till it gleams.  In the center of the table is an opening from which a flame rises, illuminating the table with a ruddy glow.  The chairs which surround the table are also carved from cooled lava and covered with plush red cushions.

title: Minor Water Table
description: Water fills the table's pedestal which is made of a large square of clear crystal.  Pebbles, sand, and plants fill the bottom, and a variety of fish and marine life can be seen through the table's clear top.

title: Tangleweed Table
description: Warm light floods through the skylight over the table.  Blooming plants hang from the ceiling and long vines fall down to the floor, providing a natural curtain.

title: Mana Table
description: An aura of security surrounds this polished modwir table on which you see some fresh mana bread.  The sweet aroma of the bread makes you wonder if someone rushed out and left it behind, or if it is a gift from the gods.

title: House Phoenix, Lockers
description: A stone counter, chipped and scratched, fills half of this small cubicle.  A delicately scented candle cannot disguise the sour smell of mildew.  An airtight, waterproof locker awaits you on the counter.

title: House Phoenix, Lockers
description: A stone counter, chipped and scratched, fills half of this small cubicle.  A delicately scented candle cannot disguise the sour smell of mildew.  An airtight, waterproof locker awaits you on the counter.

title: House Phoenix, Lockers
description: A stone counter, chipped and scratched, fills half of this small cubicle.  A delicately scented candle cannot disguise the sour smell of mildew.  An airtight, waterproof locker awaits you on the counter.

title: House Phoenix, Lockers
description: A stone counter, chipped and scratched, fills half of this small cubicle.  A delicately scented candle cannot disguise the sour smell of mildew.  An airtight, waterproof locker awaits you on the counter.

title: Locker Storage
description: This room is unremarkable in its plainness.  The walls are of perfect obsidian, unmarked and undecorated.  A single lantern lights the area with a dim glow.

title: Sylvanfair, Locker Room
description: Long branches curl protectively around a narrow counter, and glossy leaves almost hide the locker that sits there.  A burl in one of the walls looks eerily like a staring eyeball.

title: Twilight Hall, Agaric's Room
description: This room appears to be a cavern hewn from dark gray stone with white ora veins.  A rocking chair sits in front of a cleverly carved niche in the stone wall that serves as a fireplace.  The sparse furnishings include a neatly made bed covered with a grey and red blanket, and a large table holding various chemicals and potions neatly stored in jars and flasks.  A shelf on the wall holds scrolls, tomes and writing implements, including a grey tome and a black ledger labeled "Twilight Hall Accounts."

title: Wehnimer's, Jail Cell
description: Dirty walls surround you, and a metal-banded door blocks your only exit.  From somewhere in the darkness, you can hear the sound of a creature moving about.

title: Rogue Guild, Workshop Toolbench
description: The worn weathered surface of the toolbench carries its history of generations of training craftsmen.  Small files and drills lay stacked neatly at one end, while blank scraps are piled at the other.  A small pattern of grooves and scratches leaves the evidence of its constant use.

title: Schooner Docks, Bait Shop
description: The smell of fish and salty sea air pervades the small building.  Several wooden crates of varying sizes are stacked haphazardly along the back wall near a long counter.  A large barrel holds some of the shop's wares, as well as the robust stench of worms and other bait.  Behind the counter, various goods are stacked upon some long shelves.

title: A Breath of Autumn, Clothes
description: The air within the wagon's burnt orange walls is warmed by a long-piped wood stove tucked into a far corner, atop which sits a tiny, simmering pot filled with apple slices, cinnamon sticks, whole cloves, orange peels, and star anise that fragrance the steam as it rises.  Every breath is spiced and rich, like pumpkin pie and mulled cider, and a chill trickle of air seeping in from around the door teases the burgundy cotton curtains as it passes on its way deeper into the wagon.

title: A Breath of Autumn, Perfumes
description: Garlands of twine-strung leaves, acorns, and autumnal-hued scraps of cloth hang in a scalloped line high on the walls enclosing this section of the wagon, and a fan of woven straw accents each peak.  In the corners hang strands of alternating dried apple slices and cinnamon sticks, and an amber-beaded curtain shields the further reaches of the wagon from view.

title: A Breath of Autumn, Workroom
description: Golden oak shelves line the walls and are stocked with clear jars displaying a variety of dried fruits and spices, while bundles of herbs dangle from twine strung in a zigzag pattern between the support beams overhead.  Off to one side sits an overstuffed golden velvet couch, and a glass-shelved bronze cart is stationed at the far end.

title: Moot Hall, Pookia's Office
description: Messy pink handprints wrap around the walls, a series of smudges and dripping paint also adding decoration.  The floor is covered with a large white piece of canvas material which is littered with empty paint cans and splatters.   A lone broken chair occupies the center of the room, its seat offering a home to a few refreshments.  The pink oak door sits propped against the frame, removed from the hinges allowing open access into the space.

title: Moot Hall, Kiyna's Office
description: Paneled ivory silk walls are painted in warm-hues detailing a phoenix and stylized flame motifs, the design only stopping to give way to an arched window.  Lodged into a corner, a mahogany bookshelf claims residence, its shelves covered in a number of tomes.  A matte gold leather armchair sits behind a burnished red modwir desk, its surface haphazardly stacked high in paperwork.  A cozy chestnut brown leather couch faces the desk, flanked on either side by tiered end tables hosting refreshments.

title: Moot Hall, Vaemyr's Office
description: The plain white walls of the office appear almost out of place amongst the assortment of books, maps, documents, and alchemical instruments scattered about.  A large map stretches across one wall, with smaller maps of other continents pinned to the edges to expand it.  On the opposite wall a large window next to a big oak desk shines sunlight into the cluttered room.  A small tray at one edge of the desktop, the only clear space amid the tall piles of documents, holds refreshments.

title: Moot Hall, Kayse's Office
description: Ivy trickles over the top of an ecru-washed birch bookcase, its cluttered shelves illuminated by a broad bay window encapsulating a mint velvet bench.  Terminating to meet a geometric coffered ceiling, a blush silk wall sits behind a glass-topped birch desk outfitted with a plush ivory chair.  A duo of coral ceramic pots sprouting ferns flank a gilt-flecked leather couch while above a trellis-patterned sideboard and various shaped crystal vials holding trilliums decorate the wall.

title: Barracks, Rest Hall
description: Burnished wooden floors span the length of the room, broken up by a thick rolton wool rug that rests in the center of the chamber.  The expanse of a large red oak bed is tucked away along a far wall and bordered by two tall modwir armoires.  A small black mithril brazier is nestled beneath a high wooden shelf, while a pair of old boots leans up against an open closet.

title: Warcat Suite, Landing
description: The wide stairwell leads up to a worn and flat landing, enclosed by burnished wood paneled walls.  The head of a stuffed warcat has been mounted above an arched modwir door, its face covered in striped black and grey fur and its mouth frozen into a feral snarl.  A small brindle fur rug rests just before the door, its material weathered and matted with dried mud.

metadata.source: Warcat Suite, inside the frontier town of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Warcat Suite, Living Room
description: Wood paneled walls stretch in every direction of the living room, their surfaces burnished to a nice sheen that brightens slightly from the light of bronze lanterns nearby.  The center of the area is dominated by an oversized plush sofa, its rich burgundy hue matching the massive threaded tapestry hanging near a carved archway.  Nestled to the side of a modwir door stands a polished granite-topped bar.

metadata.source: Warcat Suite, inside the frontier town of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Warcat Suite, Den
description: The carved archway opens into a cozy room that is permeated with the fragrance of sandalwood and lavender.  A heavy dark oak bookcase stands on each side of a black marble fireplace, while several trinkets adorn the mantle above.  On the opposite wall sits a sturdy oak desk with a glass top covering its surface and a high-backed leather chair rising behind it.

metadata.source: Warcat Suite, inside the frontier town of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Warcat Suite, Kitchen
description: The smell of flour still hangs in the air, mixed slightly with the savory aroma of baked bread.  Wine racks occupy the wall directly above a blackened stove, and the center of the room is crowded by a heavy oak table generously stained by grease.  A small metal churn sits upon a rhimar-inset counter tucked away in one of the corners.

metadata.source: Warcat Suite, inside the frontier town of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Warcat Suite, Game Room
description: A round felt-covered table sits in the center of the room, surrounded by several plush velvet-cushioned chairs.  Wisps of jasmine smoke drift through the air, infusing the area with a faint haze that lingers lazily.  A coral-inlaid dart board has been nailed into the wall near a tall, glass-paned, oak cabinet.

metadata.source: Warcat Suite, inside the frontier town of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Warcat Suite, Bedchamber
description: Deep burgundy curtains drape across a huge bay window, uncovered just enough to allow a stream of moonlight to seep through the glass.  One entire wall is consumed by a huge four-poster oak bed, each wooden post carved with intricate etchings of prowling warcats.  An open archway leads to a wide closet where a brass-edged driftwood chest dwells within.  A tall gilt-hued mirror leans against a wall near a heavy wooden door.

title: Ready, Set, Auction!
description: Two-person benches situated equidistant from each other to form half-circle rows begin at a long mahogany table and expand outward from one end of the hall to the other, leaving only a tiny standing area for late arrivals.  Gold-trimmed mahogany buckets hang from each bench's armrest, and overly stuffed cushions line each seat to provide substantial comfort during long sessions.  Standing behind a mahogany podium, an auctioneer keeps watch over the area with a keen eye.

title: House Aspis, Hidden Landing
description: You are standing on a small landing tucked underneath the grand staircase.  There is a dust bunny in one corner, and steep steps lead downwards.

title: House Aspis, Lower Lounge
description: Carved out of the sloping hilltop and facing east, this lounge appears three-sided at first.  Then you realize one entire wall is covered with a nearly invisible crystal window that overlooks a breathtaking view of nearby pine trees that sway their branches gratefully in rhythm to the cool breeze.  Two doors lead east and west.

title: House Aspis, Workshop
description: Roughly hewn stone walls rapidly dance silently in the flickering torchlight.  There's a constant sense of something felt yet not seen, of something important distantly whispered yet unheard.  Aspis' enchanting workshop is a place of dangerous magic, where tidy oak countertops and lockers can't conceal the raw power that its wizards attempt to harness.

title: House Aspis, Spare Bedroom
description: This simply furnished bedroom is for guests of the House.  It holds a plain but comfortable bed with softened linen sheets, a small dresser and a nightstand with a candle on it.

title: House Aspis, Lower Storeroom
description: Well-stocked racks and shelves fill this room.  It is cool and dry, the perfect environment for supplies destined to last a long time.  Inventory lists dating back several decades hang from the walls, and a narrow stair leads down in one corner.

title: House Aspis, Hidden Nook
description: There isn't much room in here and the air seems stale and none too fragrant.  You can barely feel a slight breeze that seems to be coming from near the floorboards, but it doesn't seem to be doing much to freshen the air.

title: House Aspis, Under the Floor
description: You can't see more than a few inches in front of your face, but you are pretty sure you remember how to find the small opening to get back into the building.  A cold shiver drips down your back and you think you hear footsteps.  Is it your imagination, or is there really someone else down here too?

title: Underground, Narrow Tunnel
description: Black shadows dance on the periphery of your vision, but you can never seem to focus on anything long enough to identify it.  The floor of the tunnel is slick from a constant trickle of water that runs down the walls and your footing doesn't seem very secure.

title: House Aspis, Wine Cellar
description: This is a long narrow space under the foundations of the house.  It is cooler than the rooms above and rather a bit damper.  Long rows of dust covered bottles sit on wooden racks along one wall.  Casks of ale, mead, brandy and other liquid delights squat along the other wall awaiting their call to duty in the lounges and rooms abovestairs. Beads of moisture collect along fissures in the walls and an occasional drip echoes faintly through the still air.

title: House Aspis, Secret Vault
description: This is the strong room of the House.  Treasure and important papers are kept here in a massive iron safe anchored to the floor.  A small wooden table sits in front of it for use in handling money and for storing important but less valuable items.

title: House Aspis, Hallway
description: You stand in front of the strong room where each member keeps his or her valuables.  A dark opening leads into the room.

title: House Aspis, Hallway
description: You stand in front of the strong room where each member keeps his or her valuables.  A dark opening leads into the room.

title: Underground, Narrow Tunnel
description: The water running down the walls seems to be increasing in volume, making you wonder about the sturdiness of the ceiling braces that you see every few feet.  The floor of the tunnel is thick with mud, but you can see some sort of light to the west.

title: Underground, Narrow Tunnel
description: The tunnel seems to continue to the west, but a large gap in the floor prevents you from travelling any further in that direction.  Mud and water flow rapidly around your legs and through the gap, sending a small brown waterfall cascading over the edge.

title: Den of the Dragon, Stage Entry
description: The smell of paint, both fresh and old, is almost overwhelming, and the scuffed hardwood floor creaks under each footfall.  Dim lighting reveals old paint cans stacked in one corner and highlights the nondescript, flat grey walls whose only feature is the myriad painted phrases scattered here and there.  One small door leads back out and another deeper into the performers' area.

title: Den of the Dragon, Green Room
description: A scuffed oak floor is enclosed by pastel green walls.  A long vanity with several mirrors lines one wall.  Stools have been provided at the vanities so performers can put last minute touches to their make-up.  Couches and chairs make cozy sitting areas around mismatched braided rugs.  A few green plants sit in clay pots, adding a bit of serenity to the room.  There is a small niche in the wall next to the door.

title: Den of the Dragon, Backstage
description: Dark curtains separate this backstage area from the main stage and allow actors to watch for entrance cues.  Pulleys and ropes overhead attach to flats and other equipment, and one long, coiling rope attaches to a pulley controlling the heavy dark green velvet curtains that front the stage, serving to block the entire stage from audience view when closed.  A sign hangs nearby that can be read even in this darkened area.  The occasional flash of light and sound emanates from beyond the flats.

title: Den of the Dragon, Stage Right
description: Through the heavy curtain, one has a clear view of the stage.  This darkened corner provides an ideal place to reflect.  There is a hushed silence as people move to perform various duties.

title: Den of the Dragon, Stage Left
description: From this vantage point, one can see all that happens on the stage just beyond the slightly open curtain.  From this room, it is quite possible that every whisper could be heard by an audience.  Above are pulleys through which braided ropes are drawn and left to drape down.  The rope ends are coiled neatly to avoid mishap.

title: Furrier, Rooftop
description: The rooftop holds a clear vantage of the northern palisade wall and the huge guard towers flanking the north gates.  Beyond the walls stretch the huge expanse of oak and modwir trees making up the Lower Dragonsclaw Forest.

title: Wehnimer's Landing, Rooftop
description: The tops of buildings stretch out across Wehnimer's Landing, dwarfed by the wooden palisade walls rising up to enclose the town.  Below the edge, a network of cobblestone roads winds between closely-spaced shops.

title: Wehnimer's Landing, Rooftop
description: The tops of buildings stretch out across Wehnimer's Landing, dwarfed by the wooden palisade walls rising up to enclose the town.  Below the edge, a network of cobblestone roads winds between closely-spaced shops.

title: Barracks, Rooftop
description: The cobbled roads of North Ring cross below, from east to west.  Wooden palisade walls rise up near the rooftop as the scent of leather and weapon oil wafts up from the barracks.

title: Wehnimer's Landing, Rooftop
description: The tops of buildings stretch out across Wehnimer's Landing, dwarfed by the wooden palisade walls rising up to enclose the town.  Below the edge, a network of cobblestone roads winds between closely-spaced shops.

title: Wehnimer's Landing, Rooftop
description: The tops of buildings stretch out across Wehnimer's Landing, dwarfed by the wooden palisade walls rising up to enclose the town.  Below the edge, a network of cobblestone roads winds between closely-spaced shops.

title: Wehnimer's Landing, Rooftop
description: The tops of buildings stretch out across Wehnimer's Landing, dwarfed by the wooden palisade walls rising up to enclose the town.  Below the edge, a network of cobblestone roads winds between closely-spaced shops.

title: The Trading Post
description: Enclosed by whitewashed shiplap walls, the shop features a large brown bearskin rug in the center of its plank pine floor.  A tattered merchant permit hangs under the post and beam ceiling.  Right near the front is a live edge oak table inlaid with a blue resin river and a glass display case framed in richly stained oak.

title: The Trading Post, Alcove
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the whitewashed shiplap walls, and a rough-hewn post and beam ceiling rises overhead.  A plush white sheepskin rug sits in one corner of a wide plank pine floor.  There is an antique oak cabinet with frosted glass doors on one side of the shop and an ornate oak rack set with polished brass hooks on the other.

title: The Outfitting
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the whitewashed shiplap walls, and a rough-hewn post and beam ceiling rises overhead.  An intricate cloth mosaic tile rug sits in one corner of a wide plank pine floor.  There is an open cast iron safe inlaid with intricate brass scrollwork  on one side of the shop and an oak slab shelf supported by solid brass brackets on the other.

title: Irval's Weaponry
description: Beneath a vaulted ceiling, a midnight blue rising phoenix tapestry hangs on one of the smooth granite walls.  A gold-leafed mistwood cabinet and a glass-topped mistwood counter sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on a dark-stained oak floor.

title: Irval's General Store
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A warped treasure chest and a plain wooden table sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on an unfinished wooden floor.

title: Irval's Magic Shoppe
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A splintered cargo crate and a plain wooden table sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on an unfinished wooden floor.

title: Neithan's General Store
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the polished oak walls, and a vaulted ceiling rises overhead.  A worn rug sits in one corner of a polished oak floor.  There is an oversized sea chest on one side of the shop and a gilded maple cabinet on the other.

title: Neithan's Outfitting
description: A tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the ribbed black willow walls, and a vaulted ceiling rises overhead.  A bronze peg-legged cat statue sits in one corner of a dark-stained oak floor.  There is a narrow glass-topped table on one side of the shop and an elegant silver jewelry rack on the other.

title: Neithan's Weaponry
description: Beneath a glass-tiled vaulted ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A floral-etched ceramic case sits in one corner while a worn rug rests on the wooden floor.

title: Daedeus's Magic Shoppe
description: The broad sweep of the oak floor is interrupted by a sphere-topped black marble fountain.  Halfway to the golden oak ceiling, a detailed landscape painting hangs on one of the polished oak walls.  A white marble shelf is pushed to the back of the shop.

title: Daedeus's Magic Shoppe
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A gold-leafed mistwood cabinet sits in one corner while a hanging suit of full plate armor rests on the wooden floor.

title: Daedeus's Magic Shoppe
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A set of carved felwood shelves sits in one corner while a hanging suit of full plate armor rests on the wooden floor.

title: Maliku's Combat Gear
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A plain wooden table sits in one corner while a worn rug rests on an unfinished wooden floor.

title: Maliku's General Store
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A plain wooden table sits in one corner while a worn rug rests on the wooden floor.

title: Maliku's General Store
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A plain wooden table sits in one corner while a worn rug rests on the wooden floor.

title: The Hidden Glade
description: Partially hidden by tall, bright green grasses, a pebble-lined brook meanders through the area and disappears under a wall of thorny brambles.  Edelweiss courts juniper saplings near the eastern edge of the meadow, while the opposite verge is shrouded in the shadows of tower conifers.  A delicate fairy ring of scotch bonnet mushrooms encircles a patch of necrotic earth that is illuminated by silvered moonlight.

title: Hidden Glade, Boulder Summit
description: Worn smooth from the elements and the passage of time, the boulder is surrounded in a halo of mist and moisture.  Moonlight bathes the expanse in a silvery glow that is picked up by the bits of mica imbedded into the stone.  A soft checkered linen blanket offers a quiet resting place beside a fitfully burning candle, while nearby natural steps descend from the edge of the boulder and disappear into the crystal-clear depths of the brook that passes below.

title: Bard's Guild, Minstrel's Market
description: Walls paneled in warm cherrywood hold a variety of instruments, quills, and parchment displayed like precious artifacts.  Intricate iron sconces, shaped like treble clefs, emit a soft, golden light, casting a welcoming glow over the polished wooden counter.  Behind it, an elderly bard tends to customers with a gentle smile.  The air is filled with the subtle scent of old paper and wood polish, mingling harmoniously with distant strains of music.

title: The TownCrier, Lobby
description: The lofty open-beamed ceiling provides a glimpse of the second floor newsroom, visible just beyond a sturdy mahogany railing.  Sunlight filters through twin palladian windows flanking the entry, refracting through crystalline glass panes to wash the narrow tanik floorboards.  Opposite the entry doors, a polished mahogany reception counter holds an assortment of refreshments and a small handwritten card.  A twining grapevine fresco follows some curved steps ascending to the open space above.

title: The TownCrier, Community Hall
description: A wide archway opens into a spacious hall with strikingly grained mahogany walls that climb into soaring rafters.  High above, a large dome of stained glass displays four messenger birds flying in from the cardinal directions to a center emblem displaying the entwined letters T and C.  In the center of the hall, a polished tanik dance floor is flanked by groups of chairs arranged in small conversational groupings.  A pair of paneled mahogany doors framed in dark blue velvet curtains mark the northern wall.

title: The TownCrier, Auditorium
description: Tidy rows of plush seats are arranged facing an elevated stage.  Dark blue velvet curtains drape the wall behind the platform, their sheen set softly aglow by dimly lit crystal-globed chandeliers suspended from the darkened ceiling.  Covered in lushly carved wooden paneling expertly designed to amplify sound, the walls of the auditorium gradually narrow until they meet the sides of the stage, providing a singular point of focus.

title: The TownCrier, Gallery
description: A large banner is suspended from the ceiling just inside the archway, boasting an assortment of hand-drawn quills and ribbon-tied scrolls surrounding the title "Elanthian News Delivery Through The Ages."  Lush carpeting quiets the octagonal room, each wall featuring a display centered upon its smoothly plastered expanse.  High above, domed stained glass in jewel tones depicts a messenger bird coming to rest upon a twining grapevine.  A large, round rich blue leather bench provides a welcome spot to rest.

title: The TownCrier, Newsroom
description: Numerous desks in various states of disarray are scattered around the room, covered in stacks of books and papers, the odd bottle of ink perched precariously atop the piles.  Scraps of parchment are clipped to strategically placed contraptions hanging from beams.  A large blackboard is mounted on the west wall between an office and the conference room.  Open wood-framed cubbyholes line the south wall beneath glass-fronted news clippings, some empty, some bursting at the seams with unopened wax-sealed scrolls.

title: The TownCrier, Break Room
description: This cozy space provides a respite from the chaos of the newsroom, beginning with the scent of freshly brewed coffee.  Cushioned mahogany bar stools surround a high-top butcher block bar table.  An antique mahogany sideboard resides along the back wall, its surface covered with a generous assortment of treats.  Near the west wall, a well-used leather couch sits before the warmth of an iron stove.  On the stovetop, popcorn rises from a pitter-pattering copper contraption.

title: The TownCrier, Office
description: Lined on three walls with floor-to-ceiling bookshelves, the tidy office's fourth wall is occupied by a long horizontal window offering a view into the bustling newsroom.  A small slant-topped drafting table rests in the center of the room, a cushioned high-backed turning stool placed squarely beside.  A small-brimmed hat pinned with a square-carded news credential hangs from a polished mahogany coat rack.

title: The TownCrier, Conference Room
description: A long, polished mahogany table takes center stage in this well-lit meeting room.  Dark carpeting runs the length of the room, finely woven with messenger birds in flight and bordered by a twining grapevine motif in shades of taupe and mossy green.  Upon one wall, a large scale map of Elanith is framed above the tall carved credenza.  On the opposite wall, a marked-up calendar hangs beside several draft sheets of parchment.  Beside the door, a simple rectangular window looks out over the newsroom.

title: The TownCrier, Rooftop Garden
description: Offering sweeping views across the town's haphazard structures to the sparkling waters of the bay, the rooftop is furnished with comfortable bench seating encircling a central copper-clad firepit.  An enclosure protects the stairs leading back into the building, a well-worn dart board mounted on its outer wall.  Weathered grey tanik box planters, bursting with fragrant flora, surround the space.  Messenger birds swoop in to rest on a perch, observing the area momentarily before taking flight again.

title: Northern Caravansary, Cuddfan
description: Departing through the surrounding tents and wagons, a sinuous gravel-lined track connects a gaily painted bright yellow wagon to the wider world.  Laying forgotten in the nearby grass, a long oak tongue hangs off the front of the wagon, while large round stones are wedged around the high wheels.  Red-eyed colorful gaillardias and blue-hued asters grow in clusters throughout the shaggy lawn, though they stay clear of the shadows of a small alley that disappears between the back of the wagon and nearby tents.

metadata.source: Cuddfan Hollow, inside the Northern Caravansary on the outskirts of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Cuddfan Hollow, Living Space
description: Small windows in the western wall allow natural light to filter into the tidy space, though copper lanterns, pot-bellied and glossy, hang from the exposed rafters of the ceiling to illuminate even the deepest corners of the wagon.  Compact cabinets fashioned of haon rise from the painted blue and yellow floor, each covered with glossy counters and fitted with closure toggles.  A potbellied cast iron stove sits in one corner, its chimney pipe disappearing in the roof, while a key-shaped bright blue door remains open to the outside.

metadata.source: Cuddfan Hollow, inside the Northern Caravansary on the outskirts of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Cuddfan Hollow, Sleeping Space
description: Small and large rugs are stacked upon the ebonwood floors of the wagon's sleeping quarters, their woven patterns decorative and varied.  Fitted into the back half of the wagon, a large box bed occupies much of the space, though its underside has been cleverly fitted with a variety of drawers for convenient storage.  A pair of bronze sconces flank on either side of a bright off-white door that leads to the backyard.

title: Cuddfan Hollow, Yard
description: Potted plants create an organic fence that almost completely hides the various tents and wagons of the surrounding caravansary, though the prolific growth is arranged to keep the back side of a gaily painted bright yellow wagon and nearby dark alley visible at all times.  Long picnic tables rest along the northeastern section of the yard, their wide oak benches covered in thick cushions, while a large blazing bonfire surrounded by a large stone slab sits in the center.  Off to one side, a mesh-covered rain barrel sits beside a wrought iron rack filled with tinder and kindling.

metadata.source: Cuddfan Hollow, inside the Northern Caravansary on the outskirts of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Cuddfan Hollow, Rooftop
description: Guarded by a low, copper pole railing, the platform perches upon the top of the wagon and has a panoramic view of the entire caravansary.  Large, water-resistant cushions are clustered along the western end, supported by a low wall of decorative white birch, while the eastern edge has a polished copper ladder leading to the yard below.  A small painted table shares space at the center of the rooftop with a wrought iron and brass telescope.

metadata.source: Cuddfan Hollow, inside the Northern Caravansary on the outskirts of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Cuddfan Hollow, Garden Niche
description: Playfully embedded amid colorful potted plants that create a verdant separation wall, a vine-covered trellis strung with myriad silver and gold chimes connects the garden niche to a nearby backyard.  Curved stone benches are arranged in rows, creating audience seating around the niche's foci of a tile-lined alabaster fountain sporting a sculpture of Cholen.  Sunlight intermittently slips through the foliage, producing a play of colors upon the fountain's water and painting the stone in kaleidoscopic hues.

metadata.source: Cuddfan Hollow, inside the Northern Caravansary on the outskirts of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Brute's Magic Shoppe
description: A pearl-handled filigreed mandolin hangs on one of the mahogany paneled walls, and a vaulted ceiling rises overhead.  A carved ebonwood dinghy sits in one corner of a polished oak floor.  There is a bamboo rack on one side of the shop and an oversized sea chest on the other.

title: Brute's Magic Shoppe
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  An oversized sea chest sits in one corner while a worn rug rests on the wooden floor.

title: Brute's General Store
description: Beneath an uneven wooden ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  An oversized sea chest sits in one corner while a worn rug rests on the wooden floor.

title: Penelopia's Outfitting
description: Beneath a woven seagrass ceiling, a tattered pirate flag hangs on one of the woven grass divider walls.  A long mistwood counter and some carved haon pegs sit in opposite corners while an intricate sea creatures display rests on a scattered sand floor.

title: Penelopia's General Store
description: Beneath a low skylight-set ceiling, a tropical bloom wreath hangs on one of the glazed bamboo walls.  An aqua-hued seaglass display and a long mistwood counter sit in opposite corners while a stuffed octopus rests on a scattered sand floor.

title: Penelopia's Outfitting
description: Beneath a woven seagrass ceiling, a painted native mask hangs on one of the woven grass divider walls.  Some carved haon pegs and a long mistwood counter sit in opposite corners while a wooden lighthouse figurine rests on a scattered sand floor.

title: Sphere And Scythe, Shop
description: Beneath a varnished golden oak ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the plain wooden walls.  A glass-topped mistwood counter and a gold-leafed mistwood cabinet sit in opposite corners while a worn rug rests on an unfinished wooden floor.

title: Starkitty's Outfitting
description: A portrait of Darkstone Castle hangs on one of the knotty pine walls, and a modwir beam ceiling rises overhead.  A pile of striped throw pillows sits in one corner of a polished oak floor.  There is a flexible willow woven basket on one side of the shop and a vine-carved mahogany table on the other.

title: Starkitty's Magic Shoppe
description: Beneath a modwir beam ceiling, a blue watered silk tapestry hangs on one of the knotty pine walls.  A flexible willow woven basket and a vine-carved mahogany table sit in opposite corners while a pile of striped throw pillows rests on a polished oak floor.

title: Starkitty's Weaponry
description: Beneath a modwir beam ceiling, a pair of crossed bones hangs on one of the knotty pine walls.  A flexible willow woven basket and a vine-carved mahogany table sit in opposite corners while a pile of striped throw pillows rests on a polished oak floor.

title: The Stationer's Nook
description: Open, airy windows are framed by sheer ivory curtains that flutter in the salty breeze coming from the harbor.  A large teak writing desk dominates the center of the room, its surface scattered with parchment, quills, and pots of ink.  Displays of signet rings are arranged along the walls, while sticks of wax, paper rolls, and inkwells are neatly displayed on a series of shelves.  Ceramic lamps hang on pewter chains from the arched ceiling above, casting a gentle glow over the shop.

title: Belrog's General Store
description: Beneath a vaulted ceiling, a blue watered silk tapestry hangs on one of the glossy mistwood walls.  An oversized sea chest sits in one corner while a worn rug rests on the hardwood floor.

title: Belrog's General Store
description: Beneath a vaulted ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the glossy mistwood walls.  An oversized sea chest sits in one corner while a worn rug rests on the wooden floor.

title: Belrog's General Store
description: Beneath a vaulted ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the glossy mistwood walls.  An oversized sea chest sits in one corner while a worn rug rests on the wooden floor.

title: Kestrel's Perch, Lawn
description: The trees give way to a narrow, yet lush, lawn of grass which rings a country manor.  The sides of the dwelling are wooden shakes, and its roof is slate, most of which is covered with the vivid emerald of living moss.  Large rhododendron bushes frame a bright green door banded with iron and emblazoned with a painted soaring kestrel.  Dense forest stretches away from the lawn on all sides, the foliage filled with the distant call of birds.

metadata.source: Kestrel's Perch, outside the frontier town of Wehnimer's Landing

title: Kestrel's Perch, Sitting Room
description: Polished oak paneling skirts the lodge, contrasting with green trim and upholstery on the generous leather armchairs.  A large trestle table occupies one of the room's ends, flanked by a number of carved oak chairs.  In the shadow of an overstuffed green sofa is a narrow slatted stairway, which leads upward to an open loft.  A stone hearth dominates all, occupying the long wall across from a painted green door.  Above the hearth, an immense elk trophy surveys its domain with a solemn gaze.

metadata.source: Kestrel's Perch, outside the frontier town of Wehnimer's Landing
